blocks.name: csumge0
blocks.content: Extend class notation to include the sum of nonnegative extended reals.
blocks.origin: const class csumge0 { sum^ }

blocks.content: Define the arbitrary sum of nonnegative extended reals. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 17-Aug-2020.) $.

blocks.name: sge0rnre
blocks.content: When ` sum^ ` is applied to nonnegative real numbers the range used in its definition is a subset of the reals. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 17-Aug-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm sge0rnre(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wss(crn(cmpt(s0, cin(cpw(c0), cfn), csu(s1, cv(s0), cfv(c1, cv(s1))))), cr))
  -| wi(w0, wf(c1, c0, co(nat0, cico, cpnf)))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  syl(w0, wss(crn(cmpt(s0, cin(cpw(c0), cfn), csu(s1, cv(s0), cfv(c1, cv(s1))))), cr), wral(s0, cin(cpw(c0), cfn), wcel(csu(s1, cv(s0), cfv(c1, cv(s1))), cr)))
  ralrimiva(s0, cin(cpw(c0), cfn), w0, wcel(csu(s1, cv(s0), cfv(c1, cv(s1))), cr))
  fsumrecl(s1, cv(s0), cfv(c1, cv(s1)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cin(cpw(c0), cfn))))
  adantl(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cin(cpw(c0), cfn)), wcel(cv(s0), cfn))
  elinel2(cv(s0), cpw(c0), cfn)
  sseldi(cfv(c1, cv(s1)), cr, co(nat0, cico, cpnf), wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cin(cpw(c0), cfn))), wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0))))
  rge0ssre()
  ffvelrnd(c1, cv(s1), co(nat0, cico, cpnf), c0, wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cin(cpw(c0), cfn))), wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0))))
  ad2antrr(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cin(cpw(c0), cfn)), wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wf(c1, c0, co(nat0, cico, cpnf)))
  adantll(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cin(cpw(c0), cfn)), wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wcel(cv(s1), c0))
  sseldd(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0), wa(wcel(cv(s0), cin(cpw(c0), cfn)), wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0))))
  adantr(wcel(cv(s0), cin(cpw(c0), cfn)), wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wss(cv(s0), c0))
  syl(wcel(cv(s0), cin(cpw(c0), cfn)), wss(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s0), cpw(c0)))
  elinel1(cv(s0), cpw(c0), cfn)
  elpwi(cv(s0), c0)
  simpr(wcel(cv(s0), cin(cpw(c0), cfn)), wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)))
  rnmptss(s0, cin(cpw(c0), cfn), csu(s1, cv(s0), cfv(c1, cv(s1))), cr, cmpt(s0, cin(cpw(c0), cfn), csu(s1, cv(s0), cfv(c1, cv(s1)))))
  eqid(cmpt(s0, cin(cpw(c0), cfn), csu(s1, cv(s0), cfv(c1, cv(s1)))))
  diff.wa.s(s1, w0, wcel(cv(s0), cin(cpw(c0), cfn)))
  diff.wcel.s(s1, cv(s0), cin(cpw(c0), cfn))
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.cin.s(s1, cpw(c0), cfn)
  diff.cpw.s(s1, c0)
  diff.cfn.s(s1)
  diff.cin.s(s0, cpw(c0), cfn)
  diff.cpw.s(s0, c0)
  diff.cfn.s(s0)
  diff.cr.s(s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm sge0rnre(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → ran((s0 ∈(P(c0)⋂ Fin)↦ sum(s1 ∈ s0,(c1 ` s1))))⊆ ℝ)
  ⊣ (w0 →(c1 : c0 →(0[[,)]+∞)))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
  ⊣ d(s1, w0)
} = {
  syl(w0, ran((s0 ∈(P(c0)⋂ Fin)↦ sum(s1 ∈ s0,(c1 ` s1))))⊆ ℝ, ∀(s0 ∈(P(c0)⋂ Fin), sum(s1 ∈ s0,(c1 ` s1))∈ ℝ))
  ralrimiva(s0, (P(c0)⋂ Fin), w0, sum(s1 ∈ s0,(c1 ` s1))∈ ℝ)
  fsumrecl(s1, s0, (c1 ` s1), (w0 ∧ s0 ∈(P(c0)⋂ Fin)))
  adantl(w0, s0 ∈(P(c0)⋂ Fin), s0 ∈ Fin)
  elinel2(s0, P(c0), cfn)
  sseldi((c1 ` s1), cr, (0[[,)]+∞), ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈(P(c0)⋂ Fin))∧ s1 ∈ s0))
  rge0ssre()
  ffvelrnd(c1, s1, (0[[,)]+∞), c0, ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈(P(c0)⋂ Fin))∧ s1 ∈ s0))
  ad2antrr(w0, s0 ∈(P(c0)⋂ Fin), s1 ∈ s0, (c1 : c0 →(0[[,)]+∞)))
  adantll(w0, s0 ∈(P(c0)⋂ Fin), s1 ∈ s0, s1 ∈ c0)
  sseldd(s1, c0, s0, (s0 ∈(P(c0)⋂ Fin)∧ s1 ∈ s0))
  adantr(s0 ∈(P(c0)⋂ Fin), s1 ∈ s0, s0 ⊆ c0)
  syl(s0 ∈(P(c0)⋂ Fin), s0 ⊆ c0, s0 ∈ P(c0))
  elinel1(s0, P(c0), cfn)
  elpwi(s0, c0)
  simpr(s0 ∈(P(c0)⋂ Fin), s1 ∈ s0)
  rnmptss(s0, (P(c0)⋂ Fin), sum(s1 ∈ s0,(c1 ` s1)), cr, (s0 ∈(P(c0)⋂ Fin)↦ sum(s1 ∈ s0,(c1 ` s1))))
  eqid((s0 ∈(P(c0)⋂ Fin)↦ sum(s1 ∈ s0,(c1 ` s1))))
  diff.wa.s(s1, w0, s0 ∈(P(c0)⋂ Fin))
  diff.wcel.s(s1, s0, (P(c0)⋂ Fin))
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.cin.s(s1, P(c0), cfn)
  diff.cpw.s(s1, c0)
  diff.cfn.s(s1)
  diff.cin.s(s0, P(c0), cfn)
  diff.cpw.s(s0, c0)
  diff.cfn.s(s0)
  diff.cr.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: fge0icoicc
blocks.content: If ` F ` maps to nonnegative reals, then ` F ` maps to nonnegative extended reals. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 17-Aug-2020.)

blocks.name: sge0val
blocks.content: The value of the sum of nonnegative extended reals. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 17-Aug-2020.)

thm sge0val(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wf(c2, c0, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf))), wceq(cfv(csumge0, c2), cif(cpnf, csup(crn(cmpt(s0, cin(cpw(c0), cfn), csu(s1, cv(s0), cfv(c2, cv(s1))))), cxr, clt), wcel(cpnf, crn(c2)))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
} = {
  fvmptd(hs0, csumge0, c2, cif(cpnf, csup(crn(cmpt(s0, cin(cpw(c0), cfn), csu(s1, cv(s0), cfv(c2, cv(s1))))), cxr, clt), wcel(cpnf, crn(c2))), universe, cif(cpnf, csup(crn(cmpt(s0, cin(cpw(cdm(cv(hs0))), cfn), csu(s1, cv(s0), cfv(cv(hs0), cv(s1))))), cxr, clt), wcel(cpnf, crn(cv(hs0)))), universe, wa(wcel(c0, c1), wf(c2, c0, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf))))
  a1i(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wf(c2, c0, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf))), wceq(csumge0, cmpt(hs0, universe, cif(cpnf, csup(crn(cmpt(s0, cin(cpw(cdm(cv(hs0))), cfn), csu(s1, cv(s0), cfv(cv(hs0), cv(s1))))), cxr, clt), wcel(cpnf, crn(cv(hs0)))))))
  df-sumge0(hs0, s0, s1)
  ifbieq2d(cpnf, csup(crn(cmpt(s0, cin(cpw(cdm(cv(hs0))), cfn), csu(s1, cv(s0), cfv(cv(hs0), cv(s1))))), cxr, clt), csup(crn(cmpt(s0, cin(cpw(c0), cfn), csu(s1, cv(s0), cfv(c2, cv(s1))))), cxr, clt), wa(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wf(c2, c0, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf))), wceq(cv(hs0), c2)), wcel(cpnf, crn(cv(hs0))), wcel(cpnf, crn(c2)))
  adantl(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wf(c2, c0, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf))), wceq(cv(hs0), c2), wb(wcel(cpnf, crn(cv(hs0))), wcel(cpnf, crn(c2))))
  eleq2d(cpnf, crn(cv(hs0)), crn(c2), wceq(cv(hs0), c2))
  rneq(cv(hs0), c2)
  supeq1d(crn(cmpt(s0, cin(cpw(cdm(cv(hs0))), cfn), csu(s1, cv(s0), cfv(cv(hs0), cv(s1))))), cxr, clt, crn(cmpt(s0, cin(cpw(c0), cfn), csu(s1, cv(s0), cfv(c2, cv(s1))))), wa(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wf(c2, c0, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf))), wceq(cv(hs0), c2)))
  rneqd(cmpt(s0, cin(cpw(cdm(cv(hs0))), cfn), csu(s1, cv(s0), cfv(cv(hs0), cv(s1)))), cmpt(s0, cin(cpw(c0), cfn), csu(s1, cv(s0), cfv(c2, cv(s1)))), wa(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wf(c2, c0, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf))), wceq(cv(hs0), c2)))
  eqtrd(cmpt(s0, cin(cpw(cdm(cv(hs0))), cfn), csu(s1, cv(s0), cfv(cv(hs0), cv(s1)))), cmpt(s0, cin(cpw(c0), cfn), csu(s1, cv(s0), cfv(c2, cv(s1)))), cmpt(s0, cin(cpw(c0), cfn), csu(s1, cv(s0), cfv(cv(hs0), cv(s1)))), wa(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wf(c2, c0, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf))), wceq(cv(hs0), c2)))
  adantll(wcel(c0, c1), wf(c2, c0, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), wceq(cv(hs0), c2), wceq(cmpt(s0, cin(cpw(cdm(cv(hs0))), cfn), csu(s1, cv(s0), cfv(cv(hs0), cv(s1)))), cmpt(s0, cin(cpw(c0), cfn), csu(s1, cv(s0), cfv(cv(hs0), cv(s1))))))
  mpteq1d(s0, cin(cpw(cdm(cv(hs0))), cfn), csu(s1, cv(s0), cfv(cv(hs0), cv(s1))), cin(cpw(c0), cfn), wa(wf(c2, c0, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), wceq(cv(hs0), c2)))
  ineq1d(cpw(cdm(cv(hs0))), cfn, cpw(c0), wa(wf(c2, c0, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), wceq(cv(hs0), c2)))
  pweqd(cdm(cv(hs0)), c0, wa(wf(c2, c0, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), wceq(cv(hs0), c2)))
  eqtrd(cdm(cv(hs0)), c0, cdm(c2), wa(wf(c2, c0, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), wceq(cv(hs0), c2)))
  adantl(wf(c2, c0, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), wceq(cv(hs0), c2), wceq(cdm(cv(hs0)), cdm(c2)))
  dmeq(cv(hs0), c2)
  adantr(wf(c2, c0, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), wceq(cv(hs0), c2), wceq(cdm(c2), c0))
  fdm(c2, c0, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf))
  adantl(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wf(c2, c0, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf))), wceq(cv(hs0), c2), wceq(cmpt(s0, cin(cpw(c0), cfn), csu(s1, cv(s0), cfv(cv(hs0), cv(s1)))), cmpt(s0, cin(cpw(c0), cfn), csu(s1, cv(s0), cfv(c2, cv(s1))))))
  mpteq2dv(s0, cin(cpw(c0), cfn), csu(s1, cv(s0), cfv(cv(hs0), cv(s1))), csu(s1, cv(s0), cfv(c2, cv(s1))), wceq(cv(hs0), c2))
  sumeq2sdv(s1, cv(s0), cfv(cv(hs0), cv(s1)), cfv(c2, cv(s1)), wceq(cv(hs0), c2))
  fveq1(cv(hs0), c2, cv(s1))
  syl2anc(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wf(c2, c0, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf))), wcel(c2, universe), wf(c2, c0, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), wcel(c0, c1))
  simpr(wcel(c0, c1), wf(c2, c0, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)))
  simpl(wcel(c0, c1), wf(c2, c0, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)))
  fex(c2, c0, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf), c1)
  syl2anc(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wf(c2, c0, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf))), wcel(cif(cpnf, csup(crn(cmpt(s0, cin(cpw(c0), cfn), csu(s1, cv(s0), cfv(c2, cv(s1))))), cxr, clt), wcel(cpnf, crn(c2))), universe), wcel(cpnf, cxr), wcel(csup(crn(cmpt(s0, cin(cpw(c0), cfn), csu(s1, cv(s0), cfv(c2, cv(s1))))), cxr, clt), universe))
  a1i(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wf(c2, c0, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf))), wcel(cpnf, cxr))
  pnfxr()
  a1i(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wf(c2, c0, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf))), wcel(csup(crn(cmpt(s0, cin(cpw(c0), cfn), csu(s1, cv(s0), cfv(c2, cv(s1))))), cxr, clt), universe))
  supex(crn(cmpt(s0, cin(cpw(c0), cfn), csu(s1, cv(s0), cfv(c2, cv(s1))))), cxr, clt)
  xrltso()
  ifexg(cpnf, cxr, csup(crn(cmpt(s0, cin(cpw(c0), cfn), csu(s1, cv(s0), cfv(c2, cv(s1))))), cxr, clt), universe, wcel(cpnf, crn(c2)))
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(cif(cpnf, csup(crn(cmpt(s0, cin(cpw(c0), cfn), csu(s1, cv(s0), cfv(c2, cv(s1))))), cxr, clt), wcel(cpnf, crn(c2))))
  diff.hs0.c(universe)
  diff.hs0.w(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wf(c2, c0, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf))))
  diff.cin.s(s0, cpw(cdm(cv(hs0))), cfn)
  diff.cpw.s(s0, cdm(cv(hs0)))
  diff.cdm.s(s0, cv(hs0))
  diff.cin.s(s0, cpw(c0), cfn)
  diff.cpw.s(s0, c0)
  diff.cfn.s(s0)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), c2)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, cv(hs0), c2)

thm sge0val(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ c1 ∧(c2 : c0 →(0[[,]]+∞)))→(sum^ ` c2)= if(+∞ ∈ ran(c2), +∞, sup(ran((s0 ∈(P(c0)⋂ Fin)↦ sum(s1 ∈ s0,(c2 ` s1)))), ℝ*, <)))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s1, c2)
} = {
  fvmptd(hs0, csumge0, c2, if(+∞ ∈ ran(c2), +∞, sup(ran((s0 ∈(P(c0)⋂ Fin)↦ sum(s1 ∈ s0,(c2 ` s1)))), ℝ*, <)), universe, if(+∞ ∈ ran(hs0), +∞, sup(ran((s0 ∈(P(dom(hs0))⋂ Fin)↦ sum(s1 ∈ s0,(hs0 ` s1)))), ℝ*, <)), universe, (c0 ∈ c1 ∧(c2 : c0 →(0[[,]]+∞))))
  a1i((c0 ∈ c1 ∧(c2 : c0 →(0[[,]]+∞))), sum^ =(hs0 ∈ 𝕌 ↦ if(+∞ ∈ ran(hs0), +∞, sup(ran((s0 ∈(P(dom(hs0))⋂ Fin)↦ sum(s1 ∈ s0,(hs0 ` s1)))), ℝ*, <))))
  df-sumge0(hs0, s0, s1)
  ifbieq2d(cpnf, sup(ran((s0 ∈(P(dom(hs0))⋂ Fin)↦ sum(s1 ∈ s0,(hs0 ` s1)))), ℝ*, <), sup(ran((s0 ∈(P(c0)⋂ Fin)↦ sum(s1 ∈ s0,(c2 ` s1)))), ℝ*, <), ((c0 ∈ c1 ∧(c2 : c0 →(0[[,]]+∞)))∧ hs0 = c2), +∞ ∈ ran(hs0), +∞ ∈ ran(c2))
  adantl((c0 ∈ c1 ∧(c2 : c0 →(0[[,]]+∞))), hs0 = c2, (+∞ ∈ ran(hs0)↔ +∞ ∈ ran(c2)))
  eleq2d(cpnf, ran(hs0), ran(c2), hs0 = c2)
  rneq(hs0, c2)
  supeq1d(ran((s0 ∈(P(dom(hs0))⋂ Fin)↦ sum(s1 ∈ s0,(hs0 ` s1)))), cxr, clt, ran((s0 ∈(P(c0)⋂ Fin)↦ sum(s1 ∈ s0,(c2 ` s1)))), ((c0 ∈ c1 ∧(c2 : c0 →(0[[,]]+∞)))∧ hs0 = c2))
  rneqd((s0 ∈(P(dom(hs0))⋂ Fin)↦ sum(s1 ∈ s0,(hs0 ` s1))), (s0 ∈(P(c0)⋂ Fin)↦ sum(s1 ∈ s0,(c2 ` s1))), ((c0 ∈ c1 ∧(c2 : c0 →(0[[,]]+∞)))∧ hs0 = c2))
  eqtrd((s0 ∈(P(dom(hs0))⋂ Fin)↦ sum(s1 ∈ s0,(hs0 ` s1))), (s0 ∈(P(c0)⋂ Fin)↦ sum(s1 ∈ s0,(c2 ` s1))), (s0 ∈(P(c0)⋂ Fin)↦ sum(s1 ∈ s0,(hs0 ` s1))), ((c0 ∈ c1 ∧(c2 : c0 →(0[[,]]+∞)))∧ hs0 = c2))
  adantll(c0 ∈ c1, (c2 : c0 →(0[[,]]+∞)), hs0 = c2, (s0 ∈(P(dom(hs0))⋂ Fin)↦ sum(s1 ∈ s0,(hs0 ` s1)))=(s0 ∈(P(c0)⋂ Fin)↦ sum(s1 ∈ s0,(hs0 ` s1))))
  mpteq1d(s0, (P(dom(hs0))⋂ Fin), sum(s1 ∈ s0,(hs0 ` s1)), (P(c0)⋂ Fin), ((c2 : c0 →(0[[,]]+∞))∧ hs0 = c2))
  ineq1d(P(dom(hs0)), cfn, P(c0), ((c2 : c0 →(0[[,]]+∞))∧ hs0 = c2))
  pweqd(dom(hs0), c0, ((c2 : c0 →(0[[,]]+∞))∧ hs0 = c2))
  eqtrd(dom(hs0), c0, dom(c2), ((c2 : c0 →(0[[,]]+∞))∧ hs0 = c2))
  adantl((c2 : c0 →(0[[,]]+∞)), hs0 = c2, dom(hs0)= dom(c2))
  dmeq(hs0, c2)
  adantr((c2 : c0 →(0[[,]]+∞)), hs0 = c2, dom(c2)= c0)
  fdm(c2, c0, (0[[,]]+∞))
  adantl((c0 ∈ c1 ∧(c2 : c0 →(0[[,]]+∞))), hs0 = c2, (s0 ∈(P(c0)⋂ Fin)↦ sum(s1 ∈ s0,(hs0 ` s1)))=(s0 ∈(P(c0)⋂ Fin)↦ sum(s1 ∈ s0,(c2 ` s1))))
  mpteq2dv(s0, (P(c0)⋂ Fin), sum(s1 ∈ s0,(hs0 ` s1)), sum(s1 ∈ s0,(c2 ` s1)), hs0 = c2)
  sumeq2sdv(s1, s0, (hs0 ` s1), (c2 ` s1), hs0 = c2)
  fveq1(hs0, c2, s1)
  syl2anc((c0 ∈ c1 ∧(c2 : c0 →(0[[,]]+∞))), c2 ∈ 𝕌, (c2 : c0 →(0[[,]]+∞)), c0 ∈ c1)
  simpr(c0 ∈ c1, (c2 : c0 →(0[[,]]+∞)))
  simpl(c0 ∈ c1, (c2 : c0 →(0[[,]]+∞)))
  fex(c2, c0, (0[[,]]+∞), c1)
  syl2anc((c0 ∈ c1 ∧(c2 : c0 →(0[[,]]+∞))), if(+∞ ∈ ran(c2), +∞, sup(ran((s0 ∈(P(c0)⋂ Fin)↦ sum(s1 ∈ s0,(c2 ` s1)))), ℝ*, <))∈ 𝕌, +∞ ∈ ℝ*, sup(ran((s0 ∈(P(c0)⋂ Fin)↦ sum(s1 ∈ s0,(c2 ` s1)))), ℝ*, <)∈ 𝕌)
  a1i((c0 ∈ c1 ∧(c2 : c0 →(0[[,]]+∞))), +∞ ∈ ℝ*)

  fge0npnf(c0, c1, w0)

  ⊢ (w0 →(sum^ ` c0)= sup(ran((s0 ∈(P(c1)⋂ Fin)↦ sum(s1 ∈ s0,(c0 ` s1)))), ℝ*, <))
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈ c2)

blocks.name: fsumlesge0
blocks.content: Every finite subsum of nonnegative reals is less than or equal to the extended sum over the whole (possibly infinite) domain. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 17-Aug-2020.)

thm sge0revalmpt(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(sum^ `(s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1))= sup(ran((s1 ∈(P(c0)⋂ Fin)↦ sum(s0 ∈ s1, c1))), ℝ*, <))
  ⊣ F/(s0, w0)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ c2)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0)→ c1 ∈(0[[,)]+∞))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, w0)
} = {
  eqtrd((sum^ `(s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)), sup(ran((s1 ∈(P(c0)⋂ Fin)↦ sum(s0 ∈ s1, c1))), ℝ*, <), sup(ran((s1 ∈(P(c0)⋂ Fin)↦ sum(hs0 ∈ s1,((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)` hs0)))), ℝ*, <), w0)
  sge0reval(s1, hs0, (s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1), c0, c2, w0)
  fmptdf(s0, (s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1), c0, (0[[,)]+∞), c1, w0)
  supeq1d(ran((s1 ∈(P(c0)⋂ Fin)↦ sum(hs0 ∈ s1,((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)` hs0)))), cxr, clt, ran((s1 ∈(P(c0)⋂ Fin)↦ sum(s0 ∈ s1, c1))), w0)
  rneqd((s1 ∈(P(c0)⋂ Fin)↦ sum(hs0 ∈ s1,((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)` hs0))), (s1 ∈(P(c0)⋂ Fin)↦ sum(s0 ∈ s1, c1)), w0)
  mpteq2dva(s1, (P(c0)⋂ Fin), sum(hs0 ∈ s1,((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)` hs0)), sum(s0 ∈ s1, c1), w0)
  eqtrd(sum(hs0 ∈ s1,((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)` hs0)), sum(s0 ∈ s1, c1), sum(s0 ∈ s1,((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)` s0)), (w0 ∧ s1 ∈(P(c0)⋂ Fin)))
  a1i((w0 ∧ s1 ∈(P(c0)⋂ Fin)), sum(hs0 ∈ s1,((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)` hs0))= sum(s0 ∈ s1,((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)` s0)))

  nfcv(hs0, s1)

  nfmpt1(s0, c0, c1)
  nfcv(s0, hs0)
  nfcv(hs0, ((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)` s0))
  syl((w0 ∧ s1 ∈(P(c0)⋂ Fin)), sum(s0 ∈ s1,((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)` s0))= sum(s0 ∈ s1, c1), ∀(s0 ∈ s1,((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)` s0)= c1))
  ralrimi(s0, s1, (w0 ∧ s1 ∈(P(c0)⋂ Fin)), ((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)` s0)= c1)
  nfan(s0, w0, s1 ∈(P(c0)⋂ Fin))
  nfv(s0, s1 ∈(P(c0)⋂ Fin))
  ex((w0 ∧ s1 ∈(P(c0)⋂ Fin)), s0 ∈ s1, ((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)` s0)= c1)
  syl2anc(((w0 ∧ s1 ∈(P(c0)⋂ Fin))∧ s0 ∈ s1), ((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)` s0)= c1, s0 ∈ c0, c1 ∈(0[[,)]+∞))
  syl2anc(((w0 ∧ s1 ∈(P(c0)⋂ Fin))∧ s0 ∈ s1), c1 ∈(0[[,)]+∞), w0, s0 ∈ c0)
  simpll(w0, s1 ∈(P(c0)⋂ Fin), s0 ∈ s1)
  adantll(w0, s1 ∈(P(c0)⋂ Fin), s0 ∈ s1, s0 ∈ c0)
  sseldd(s0, c0, s1, (s1 ∈(P(c0)⋂ Fin)∧ s0 ∈ s1))

  elpwinss(s1, c0, cfn)

blocks.name: sge0tsms
blocks.content: ` sum^ ` applied to a nonnegative function (its meaningful domain) is the same as the infinite group sum (that's always convergent, in this case). (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 17-Aug-2020.)

blocks.name: sge0cl
blocks.content: The arbitrary sum of nonnegative extended reals is a nonnegative extended real. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 17-Aug-2020.)
blocks.origin:

blocks.name: sge0f1o
blocks.content: Re-index a nonnegative extended sum using a bijection. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 17-Aug-2020.)

  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), c4), wceq(c1, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wf1o(c6, c2, c0))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s1), c2)), wceq(cfv(c6, cv(s1)), c4))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c1, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s0, c6)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c6)
} = {
  pm2.61dan(w0, wceq(cfv(csumge0, cmpt(s0, c0, c1)), cfv(csumge0, cmpt(s1, c2, c3))), wcel(cpnf, crn(cmpt(s1, c2, c3))))

blocks.name: sge0snmpt
blocks.content: A sum of a nonnegative extended real is the term. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 17-Aug-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm sge0snmpt(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cfv(csumge0, cmpt(s0, csn(c0), c1)), c2))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(c1, c2))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  eqtrd(cfv(csumge0, cmpt(s0, csn(c0), c1)), c2, cfv(cmpt(s0, csn(c0), c1), c0), w0)
  sge0sn(cmpt(s0, csn(c0), c1), c0, c3, w0)
  fmptd(s0, cmpt(s0, csn(c0), c1), csn(c0), co(nat0, cicc, cpnf), c1, w0)
  eqeltrd(c1, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf), c2, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), csn(c0))))
  adantl(w0, wcel(cv(s0), csn(c0)), wceq(c1, c2))
  syl(wcel(cv(s0), csn(c0)), wceq(c1, c2), wceq(cv(s0), c0))
  elsni(cv(s0), c0)
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(s0), csn(c0)), wcel(c2, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)))
  eqid(cmpt(s0, csn(c0), c1))
  fvmptd(s0, cmpt(s0, csn(c0), c1), c0, c2, csn(c0), c1, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf), w0)
  eqidd(cmpt(s0, csn(c0), c1), w0)
  adantl(w0, wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(c1, c2))
  syl(w0, wcel(c0, csn(c0)), wcel(c0, c3))
  snidg(c0, c3)
  diff.csn.s(s0, c0)
  diff.co.s(s0, nat0, cicc, cpnf)
  diff.nat0.s(s0)
  diff.cicc.s(s0)
  diff.cpnf.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: sge0fsum
blocks.content: The arbitrary sum of a finite set of nonnegative extended real numbers is equal to the sum of those numbers, when none of them is ` +oo ` (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 17-Aug-2020.)

blocks.name: sge0rern
blocks.content: If the sum of nonnegative extended reals is not ` +oo ` then no terms is ` +oo ` . (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 17-Aug-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm sge0rern(class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wn(wcel(cpnf, crn(c0))))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c2))
  -| wi(w0, wf(c0, c1, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(cfv(csumge0, c0), cr))
} = {
  pm2.65da(w0, wcel(cpnf, crn(c0)), wceq(cfv(csumge0, c0), cpnf))
  sge0pnfval(c0, c1, c2, wa(w0, wcel(cpnf, crn(c0))))
  simpr(w0, wcel(cpnf, crn(c0)))
  mpbid(wa(w0, wcel(cpnf, crn(c0))), wn(wceq(cfv(csumge0, c0), cpnf)), wcel(cfv(csumge0, c0), cr))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cpnf, crn(c0)), wcel(cfv(csumge0, c0), cr))
  sge0repnf(c0, c1, c2, wa(w0, wcel(cpnf, crn(c0))))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cpnf, crn(c0)), wcel(c1, c2))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cpnf, crn(c0)), wf(c0, c1, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm sge0rern(class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → ¬ +∞ ∈ ran(c0))
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈ c2)
  ⊣ (w0 →(c0 : c1 →(0[[,]]+∞)))
  ⊣ (w0 →(sum^ ` c0)∈ ℝ)
} = {
  pm2.65da(w0, +∞ ∈ ran(c0), (sum^ ` c0)= +∞)
  sge0pnfval(c0, c1, c2, (w0 ∧ +∞ ∈ ran(c0)))
  simpr(w0, +∞ ∈ ran(c0))
  mpbid((w0 ∧ +∞ ∈ ran(c0)), ¬(sum^ ` c0)= +∞, (sum^ ` c0)∈ ℝ)
  adantr(w0, +∞ ∈ ran(c0), (sum^ ` c0)∈ ℝ)
  sge0repnf(c0, c1, c2, (w0 ∧ +∞ ∈ ran(c0)))
  adantr(w0, +∞ ∈ ran(c0), c1 ∈ c2)
  adantr(w0, +∞ ∈ ran(c0), (c0 : c1 →(0[[,]]+∞)))
}

blocks.name: sge0less
blocks.content: A shorter sum of nonnegative extended reals is smaller than a longer one. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 17-Aug-2020.)

thm sge0rnbnd(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {

  ⊣ d(s2, s3)

  ⊣ d(s0, c1)

  ⊣ d(s2, c1)

  syl2anc(w0, ∃(s0 ∈ ℝ, ∀(s1 ∈ ran((s2 ∈(P(c0)⋂ Fin)↦ sum(s3 ∈ s2,(c1 ` s3)))), s1[≤]s0)), (sum^ ` c1)∈ ℝ, ∀(s1 ∈ ran((s2 ∈(P(c0)⋂ Fin)↦ sum(s3 ∈ s2,(c1 ` s3)))), s1[≤](sum^ ` c1)))
  ralrimiva(s1, ran((s2 ∈(P(c0)⋂ Fin)↦ sum(s3 ∈ s2,(c1 ` s3)))), w0, s1[≤](sum^ ` c1))
  sylc((w0 ∧ s1 ∈ ran((s2 ∈(P(c0)⋂ Fin)↦ sum(s3 ∈ s2,(c1 ` s3))))), s1[≤](sum^ ` c1), w0, ∃(s2 ∈(P(c0)⋂ Fin), s1 = sum(s3 ∈ s2,(c1 ` s3))))
  simpl(w0, s1 ∈ ran((s2 ∈(P(c0)⋂ Fin)↦ sum(s3 ∈ s2,(c1 ` s3)))))
  adantl(w0, s1 ∈ ran((s2 ∈(P(c0)⋂ Fin)↦ sum(s3 ∈ s2,(c1 ` s3)))), ∃(s2 ∈(P(c0)⋂ Fin), s1 = sum(s3 ∈ s2,(c1 ` s3))))

blocks.name: sge0gerp
blocks.content: The arbitrary sum of nonnegative extended reals is greater than or equal to a given extended real number if this number can be approximated from below by finite subsums. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 17-Aug-2020.)

thm sge0gerp(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {

  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), crp)), wrex(s1, cin(cpw(c2), cfn), wbr(c0, cle, co(cfv(csumge0, cres(c1, cv(s1))), cxad, cv(s0)))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  breqtrd(c0, cle, cfv(csumge0, c1), csup(crn(cmpt(s1, cin(cpw(c2), cfn), cfv(csumge0, cres(c1, cv(s1))))), cxr, clt), w0)
  supxrge(s0, hs0, c0, crn(cmpt(s1, cin(cpw(c2), cfn), cfv(csumge0, cres(c1, cv(s1))))), w0)
  nfv(s0, w0)
  syl(w0, wss(crn(cmpt(s1, cin(cpw(c2), cfn), cfv(csumge0, cres(c1, cv(s1))))), cxr), wral(s1, cin(cpw(c2), cfn), wcel(cfv(csumge0, cres(c1, cv(s1))), cxr)))
  ralrimiva(s1, cin(cpw(c2), cfn), w0, wcel(cfv(csumge0, cres(c1, cv(s1))), cxr))
  sge0xrcl(cres(c1, cv(s1)), cv(s1), cin(cpw(c2), cfn), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s1), cin(cpw(c2), cfn))))
  simpr(w0, wcel(cv(s1), cin(cpw(c2), cfn)))

thm sge0gerp(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → c0[≤](sum^ ` c1))
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈ c3)
  ⊣ (w0 →(c1 : c2 →(0[[,]]+∞)))
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ ℝ*)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ ℝ+)→ ∃(s1 ∈(P(c2)⋂ Fin), c0[≤]((sum^ `(c1 |` s1))[+]s0)))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
  ⊣ d(s1, w0)
} = {
  breqtrd(c0, cle, (sum^ ` c1), sup(ran((s1 ∈(P(c2)⋂ Fin)↦(sum^ `(c1 |` s1)))), ℝ*, <), w0)
  supxrge(s0, hs0, c0, ran((s1 ∈(P(c2)⋂ Fin)↦(sum^ `(c1 |` s1)))), w0)
  nfv(s0, w0)
  syl(w0, ran((s1 ∈(P(c2)⋂ Fin)↦(sum^ `(c1 |` s1))))⊆ ℝ*, ∀(s1 ∈(P(c2)⋂ Fin),(sum^ `(c1 |` s1))∈ ℝ*))
  ralrimiva(s1, (P(c2)⋂ Fin), w0, (sum^ `(c1 |` s1))∈ ℝ*)
  sge0xrcl((c1 |` s1), s1, (P(c2)⋂ Fin), (w0 ∧ s1 ∈(P(c2)⋂ Fin)))
  simpr(w0, s1 ∈(P(c2)⋂ Fin))
  fssresd(c1, s1, (0[[,]]+∞), c2, (w0 ∧ s1 ∈(P(c2)⋂ Fin)))
  adantr(w0, s1 ∈(P(c2)⋂ Fin), (c1 : c2 →(0[[,]]+∞)))
  adantl(w0, s1 ∈(P(c2)⋂ Fin), s1 ⊆ c2)
  syl(s1 ∈(P(c2)⋂ Fin), s1 ⊆ c2, s1 ∈ P(c2))
  elinel1(s1, P(c2), cfn)
  elpwi(s1, c2)
  rnmptss(s1, (P(c2)⋂ Fin), (sum^ `(c1 |` s1)), cxr, (s1 ∈(P(c2)⋂ Fin)↦(sum^ `(c1 |` s1))))
  mpd((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ ℝ+), ∃(hs0 ∈ ran((s1 ∈(P(c2)⋂ Fin)↦(sum^ `(c1 |` s1)))), c0[≤](hs0[+]s0)), ∃(s1 ∈(P(c2)⋂ Fin), c0[≤]((sum^ `(c1 |` s1))[+]s0)))
  rexlimd(s1, (P(c2)⋂ Fin), (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ ℝ+), c0[≤]((sum^ `(c1 |` s1))[+]s0), ∃(hs0 ∈ ran((s1 ∈(P(c2)⋂ Fin)↦(sum^ `(c1 |` s1)))), c0[≤](hs0[+]s0)))
  nfv(s1, (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ ℝ+))
  nfrex(s1, hs0, ran((s1 ∈(P(c2)⋂ Fin)↦(sum^ `(c1 |` s1)))), c0[≤](hs0[+]s0))
  nfrn(s1, (s1 ∈(P(c2)⋂ Fin)↦(sum^ `(c1 |` s1))))
  nfmpt1(s1, (P(c2)⋂ Fin), (sum^ `(c1 |` s1)))
  nfv(s1, c0[≤](hs0[+]s0))
  3exp((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ ℝ+), s1 ∈(P(c2)⋂ Fin), c0[≤]((sum^ `(c1 |` s1))[+]s0), ∃(hs0 ∈ ran((s1 ∈(P(c2)⋂ Fin)↦(sum^ `(c1 |` s1)))), c0[≤](hs0[+]s0)))
  syl2anc(((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ ℝ+)∧ s1 ∈(P(c2)⋂ Fin)∧ c0[≤]((sum^ `(c1 |` s1))[+]s0)), ∃(hs0 ∈ ran((s1 ∈(P(c2)⋂ Fin)↦(sum^ `(c1 |` s1)))), c0[≤](hs0[+]s0)), (sum^ `(c1 |` s1))∈ ran((s1 ∈(P(c2)⋂ Fin)↦(sum^ `(c1 |` s1)))), c0[≤]((sum^ `(c1 |` s1))[+]s0))
  3ad2ant2((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ ℝ+), s1 ∈(P(c2)⋂ Fin), c0[≤]((sum^ `(c1 |` s1))[+]s0), (sum^ `(c1 |` s1))∈ ran((s1 ∈(P(c2)⋂ Fin)↦(sum^ `(c1 |` s1)))))
  syl2anc(s1 ∈(P(c2)⋂ Fin), (sum^ `(c1 |` s1))∈ ran((s1 ∈(P(c2)⋂ Fin)↦(sum^ `(c1 |` s1)))), s1 ∈(P(c2)⋂ Fin), (sum^ `(c1 |` s1))∈ 𝕌)
  id(s1 ∈(P(c2)⋂ Fin))
  fvexd(csumge0, (c1 |` s1), s1 ∈(P(c2)⋂ Fin))

  nfv(hs0, c0[≤]((sum^ `(c1 |` s1))[+]s0))
  breq2d(c0, cle, (hs0[+]s0), ((sum^ `(c1 |` s1))[+]s0), hs0 =(sum^ `(c1 |` s1)))
  oveq1(hs0, (sum^ `(c1 |` s1)), cxad, s0)
  eqcomd(sup(ran((s1 ∈(P(c2)⋂ Fin)↦(sum^ `(c1 |` s1)))), ℝ*, <), (sum^ ` c1), w0)
  sge0sup(s1, c1, c2, c3, w0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.crn.s(s0, (s1 ∈(P(c2)⋂ Fin)↦(sum^ `(c1 |` s1))))

  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.cin.s(s1, P(c2), cfn)
  diff.cpw.s(s1, c2)
  diff.cfn.s(s1)
  diff.cxr.s(s1)

  diff.co.s(s1, hs0, cxad, s0)

blocks.name: sge0pnffigt
blocks.content: If the sum of nonnegative extended reals is ` +oo ` , then any real number can be dominated by finite subsums. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 17-Aug-2020.)

blocks.name: sge0ssre
blocks.content: If a sum of nonnegative extended reals is real, than any subsum is real. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 17-Aug-2020.)

thm sge0ssre(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(cfv(csumge0, cres(c0, c1)), cr))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wf(c0, c2, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(cfv(csumge0, c0), cr))
} = {
  syl22anc(w0, wcel(cfv(csumge0, cres(c0, c1)), cr), wcel(cfv(csumge0, cres(c0, c1)), cxr), wcel(cfv(csumge0, c0), cr), wbr(cmnf, clt, cfv(csumge0, cres(c0, c1))), wbr(cfv(csumge0, cres(c0, c1)), cle, cfv(csumge0, c0)))
  xrltletrd(cmnf, cfv(csumge0, cres(c0, c1)), nat0, w0)
  a1i(w0, wcel(cmnf, cxr))
  mnfxr()
  a1i(w0, wcel(nat0, cxr))
  0xr()
  sge0xrcl(cres(c0, c1), cin(c2, c1), universe, w0)
  a1i(w0, wbr(cmnf, clt, nat0))
  mnflt0()
  sge0ge0(cres(c0, c1), cin(c2, c1), universe, w0)
  syl(w0, wcel(cin(c2, c1), universe), wcel(c2, c3))
  inex1g(c2, c3, c1)
  syl(w0, wf(cres(c0, c1), cin(c2, c1), co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), wf(c0, c2, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)))
  fresin(c0, c2, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf), c1)
  sge0less(c0, c1, c2, c3, w0)
  xrre(cfv(csumge0, cres(c0, c1)), cfv(csumge0, c0))
}

  simp3(∀(s0 ∈(P(c2)⋂ Fin),(sum^ `(c0 |` s0))[≤]c1), s0 ∈(P(c2)⋂ Fin), hs0 =(sum^ `(c0 |` s0)))
  3adant3(∀(s0 ∈(P(c2)⋂ Fin),(sum^ `(c0 |` s0))[≤]c1), s0 ∈(P(c2)⋂ Fin), hs0 =(sum^ `(c0 |` s0)), (sum^ `(c0 |` s0))[≤]c1)

  adantr(w0, ∀(s0 ∈(P(c2)⋂ Fin),(sum^ `(c0 |` s0))[≤]c1), ran((s0 ∈(P(c2)⋂ Fin)↦(sum^ `(c0 |` s0))))⊆ ℝ*)

blocks.name: sge0lessmpt
blocks.content: A shorter sum of nonnegative extended reals is smaller than a longer one. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 17-Aug-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm sge0lessmpt(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wbr(cfv(csumge0, cmpt(s0, c0, c1)), cle, cfv(csumge0, cmpt(s0, c2, c1))))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c3))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2)), wcel(c1, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)))
  -| wi(w0, wss(c0, c2))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  eqbrtrd(cfv(csumge0, cmpt(s0, c0, c1)), cle, cfv(csumge0, cmpt(s0, c2, c1)), cfv(csumge0, cres(cmpt(s0, c2, c1), c0)), w0)
  fveq2d(csumge0, cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cres(cmpt(s0, c2, c1), c0), w0)
  syl(w0, wceq(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cres(cmpt(s0, c2, c1), c0)), w0)
  id(w0)
  eqcomd(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cres(cmpt(s0, c2, c1), c0), w0)
  resmptd(s0, c2, c1, c0, w0)
  sge0less(cmpt(s0, c2, c1), c0, c2, c3, w0)
  fmptd(s0, cmpt(s0, c2, c1), c2, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf), c1, w0)
  eqid(cmpt(s0, c2, c1))
  diff.co.s(s0, nat0, cicc, cpnf)
  diff.nat0.s(s0)
  diff.cicc.s(s0)
  diff.cpnf.s(s0)
}

thm sge0lessmpt(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(sum^ `(s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1))[≤](sum^ `(s0 ∈ c2 ↦ c1)))
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈ c3)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c2)→ c1 ∈(0[[,]]+∞))
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ⊆ c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
} = {
  eqbrtrd((sum^ `(s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)), cle, (sum^ `(s0 ∈ c2 ↦ c1)), (sum^ `((s0 ∈ c2 ↦ c1)|` c0)), w0)

  resmptd(s0, c2, c1, c0, w0)
  sge0less((s0 ∈ c2 ↦ c1), c0, c2, c3, w0)
  fmptd(s0, (s0 ∈ c2 ↦ c1), c2, (0[[,]]+∞), c1, w0)
  eqid((s0 ∈ c2 ↦ c1))
  diff.co.s(s0, nat0, cicc, cpnf)
  diff.nat0.s(s0)
  diff.cicc.s(s0)
  diff.cpnf.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: sge0ltfirp
blocks.content: If the sum of nonnegative extended reals is real, then it can be approximated from below by finite subsums. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 17-Aug-2020.)

blocks.name: sge0prle
blocks.content: The sum of a pair of nonnegative extended reals is less than or equal their extended addition. When it is a distinct pair, than equality holds, see ~ sge0pr . (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 17-Aug-2020.)
blocks.origin:

  |- wi(w0, wbr(cfv(csumge0, cmpt(s0, cpr(c0, c1), c2)), cle, co(c3, cxad, c4)))

  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c4, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(c2, c3))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), c1), wceq(c2, c4))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s0, c5)
  -| diffsc(s0, c6)

blocks.content: The arbitrary sum of nonnegative extended reals is greater than or equal to a given extended real number if this number can be approximated from below by finite subsums. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 17-Aug-2020.)

} = {
  sge0gerp(s1, s2, c0, cmpt(s0, c1, c2), c1, c3, w0)

  reximdva(s2, cin(cpw(c1), cfn), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s1), crp)), wbr(c0, cle, co(cfv(csumge0, cmpt(s0, cv(s2), c2)), cxad, cv(s1))), wbr(c0, cle, co(cfv(csumge0, cres(cmpt(s0, c1, c2), cv(s2))), cxad, cv(s1))))

  biimpd(wcel(cv(s2), cin(cpw(c1), cfn)), wbr(c0, cle, co(cfv(csumge0, cmpt(s0, cv(s2), c2)), cxad, cv(s1))), wbr(c0, cle, co(cfv(csumge0, cres(cmpt(s0, c1, c2), cv(s2))), cxad, cv(s1))))
  breq2d(c0, cle, co(cfv(csumge0, cmpt(s0, cv(s2), c2)), cxad, cv(s1)), co(cfv(csumge0, cres(cmpt(s0, c1, c2), cv(s2))), cxad, cv(s1)), wcel(cv(s2), cin(cpw(c1), cfn)))

blocks.name: sge0resrn
blocks.content: The sum of nonnegative extended reals restricted to the range of a function is less than or equal to the sum of the composition of the two functions (well-order hypothesis allows to avoid using the axiom of choice). (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 17-Aug-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm sge0resrn(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wbr(cfv(csumge0, cres(c0, crn(c1))), cle, cfv(csumge0, ccom(c0, c1))))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wf(c0, c4, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)))
  -| wi(w0, wf(c1, c2, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wwe(c5, c2))
} = {
  mpd(w0, wbr(cfv(csumge0, cres(c0, crn(c1))), cle, cfv(csumge0, ccom(c0, c1))), wrex(hs0, cpw(c2), wf1o(cres(c1, cv(hs0)), cv(hs0), crn(c1))))
  wessf1orn(hs0, c2, c1, c3, c5, w0)
  ffnd(c1, c2, c4, w0)
  rexlimdv(hs0, cpw(c2), w0, wf1o(cres(c1, cv(hs0)), cv(hs0), crn(c1)), wbr(cfv(csumge0, cres(c0, crn(c1))), cle, cfv(csumge0, ccom(c0, c1))))
  3exp(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cpw(c2)), wf1o(cres(c1, cv(hs0)), cv(hs0), crn(c1)), wbr(cfv(csumge0, cres(c0, crn(c1))), cle, cfv(csumge0, ccom(c0, c1))))
  sge0resrnlem(c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, cv(hs0), w3a(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cpw(c2)), wf1o(cres(c1, cv(hs0)), cv(hs0), crn(c1))))
  3ad2ant1(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cpw(c2)), wf1o(cres(c1, cv(hs0)), cv(hs0), crn(c1)), wcel(c2, c3))
  3ad2ant1(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cpw(c2)), wf1o(cres(c1, cv(hs0)), cv(hs0), crn(c1)), wf(c0, c4, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)))
  3ad2ant1(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cpw(c2)), wf1o(cres(c1, cv(hs0)), cv(hs0), crn(c1)), wf(c1, c2, c4))
  simp2(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cpw(c2)), wf1o(cres(c1, cv(hs0)), cv(hs0), crn(c1)))
  simp3(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cpw(c2)), wf1o(cres(c1, cv(hs0)), cv(hs0), crn(c1)))
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c5)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs0.w(wbr(cfv(csumge0, cres(c0, crn(c1))), cle, cfv(csumge0, ccom(c0, c1))))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm sge0resrn(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(sum^ `(c0 |` ran(c1)))[≤](sum^ `(c0 ∘ c1)))
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈ c3)
  ⊣ (w0 →(c0 : c4 →(0[[,]]+∞)))
  ⊣ (w0 →(c1 : c2 → c4))
  ⊣ (w0 → c5 ≤ c2)
} = {
  mpd(w0, (sum^ `(c0 |` ran(c1)))[≤](sum^ `(c0 ∘ c1)), ∃(hs0 ∈ P(c2),((c1 |` hs0): hs0 ↔ ran(c1))))

  rexlimdv(hs0, P(c2), w0, ((c1 |` hs0): hs0 ↔ ran(c1)), (sum^ `(c0 |` ran(c1)))[≤](sum^ `(c0 ∘ c1)))
  3exp(w0, hs0 ∈ P(c2), ((c1 |` hs0): hs0 ↔ ran(c1)), (sum^ `(c0 |` ran(c1)))[≤](sum^ `(c0 ∘ c1)))

  3ad2ant1(w0, hs0 ∈ P(c2), ((c1 |` hs0): hs0 ↔ ran(c1)), (c1 : c2 → c4))
  simp2(w0, hs0 ∈ P(c2), ((c1 |` hs0): hs0 ↔ ran(c1)))
  simp3(w0, hs0 ∈ P(c2), ((c1 |` hs0): hs0 ↔ ran(c1)))

blocks.name: sge0ssrempt
blocks.content: If a sum of nonnegative extended reals is real, than any subsum is real. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 17-Aug-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm sge0ssrempt(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {

  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
} = {
  eqeltrd(cfv(csumge0, cmpt(s0, c0, c1)), cr, cfv(csumge0, cres(cmpt(s0, c2, c1), c0)), w0)
  eqcomd(cfv(csumge0, cmpt(s0, c0, c1)), cfv(csumge0, cres(cmpt(s0, c2, c1), c0)), w0)

  diff.co.s(s0, nat0, cicc, cpnf)
  diff.nat0.s(s0)
  diff.cicc.s(s0)
  diff.cpnf.s(s0)
}

  ⊢ (w0 →(sum^ `(s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1))∈ ℝ)

blocks.name: sge0le
blocks.content: If all of the terms of sums compare, so do the sums. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 17-Aug-2020.)

blocks.name: sge0ltfirpmpt
blocks.content: If the extended sum of nonnegative reals is not ` +oo ` , then it can be approximated from below by finite subsums. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 17-Aug-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm sge0ltfirpmpt(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wrex(s0, cin(cpw(c0), cfn), wbr(cfv(csumge0, cmpt(s1, c0, c1)), clt, co(cfv(csumge0, cmpt(s1, cv(s0), c1)), caddc, c2))))
  -| wnf(s1, w0)
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c3))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s1), c0)), wcel(c1, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, crp))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(cfv(csumge0, cmpt(s1, c0, c1)), cr))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  mpd(w0, wrex(s0, cin(cpw(c0), cfn), wbr(cfv(csumge0, cmpt(s1, c0, c1)), clt, co(cfv(csumge0, cmpt(s1, cv(s0), c1)), caddc, c2))), wrex(s0, cin(cpw(c0), cfn), wbr(cfv(csumge0, cmpt(s1, c0, c1)), clt, co(cfv(csumge0, cres(cmpt(s1, c0, c1), cv(s0))), caddc, c2))))
  sge0ltfirp(s0, c0, cmpt(s1, c0, c1), c2, c3, w0)
  fmptdf(s1, cmpt(s1, c0, c1), c0, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf), c1, w0)
  eqid(cmpt(s1, c0, c1))
  a1i(w0, wi(wrex(s0, cin(cpw(c0), cfn), wbr(cfv(csumge0, cmpt(s1, c0, c1)), clt, co(cfv(csumge0, cres(cmpt(s1, c0, c1), cv(s0))), caddc, c2))), wrex(s0, cin(cpw(c0), cfn), wbr(cfv(csumge0, cmpt(s1, c0, c1)), clt, co(cfv(csumge0, cmpt(s1, cv(s0), c1)), caddc, c2)))))

blocks.name: sge0split
blocks.content: Split a sum of nonnegative extended reals into two parts. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 17-Aug-2020.)

  diff.hs1.w(wa(wa(w0, wn(wcel(cpnf, crn(cres(c0, c1))))), wcel(cv(hs0), cin(cpw(c5), cfn))))
  diff.hs1.c(cres(c0, c2))
  diff.hs1.w(wa(wa(w0, wn(wcel(cpnf, crn(cres(c0, c2))))), wcel(cv(hs0), cin(cpw(c5), cfn))))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c5)
  diff.hs1.c(c5)
  diff.hs1.w(wa(wa(w0, wn(wcel(cpnf, crn(cres(c0, c1))))), wn(wcel(cpnf, crn(cres(c0, c2))))))
  diff.hs6.c(crn(cmpt(hs0, cin(cpw(c5), cfn), csu(hs1, cv(hs0), cfv(c0, cv(hs1))))))
  diff.hs6.c(co(csup(crn(cmpt(hs2, cin(cpw(c1), cfn), csu(hs3, cv(hs2), cfv(cres(c0, c1), cv(hs3))))), cxr, clt), cxad, csup(crn(cmpt(hs4, cin(cpw(c2), cfn), csu(hs5, cv(hs4), cfv(cres(c0, c2), cv(hs5))))), cxr, clt)))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
}

blocks.name: sge0lempt
blocks.content: If all of the terms of sums compare, so do the sums. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 17-Aug-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm sge0lempt(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wbr(cfv(csumge0, cmpt(s0, c0, c1)), cle, cfv(csumge0, cmpt(s0, c0, c2))))
  -| wnf(s0, w0)
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c3))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c1, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c2, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wbr(c1, cle, c2))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
} = {
  sge0le(hs0, cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cmpt(s0, c0, c2), c0, c3, w0)
  fmptdf(s0, cmpt(s0, c0, c1), c0, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf), c1, w0)
  fmptdf(s0, cmpt(s0, c0, c2), c0, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf), c2, w0)
  mpbird(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), wbr(cfv(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cv(hs0)), cle, cfv(cmpt(s0, c0, c2), cv(hs0))), wbr(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), cle, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c2)))
  chvar(s0, hs0, wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), wbr(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), cle, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c2))), wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wbr(c1, cle, c2)))
  nfim(s0, wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), wbr(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), cle, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c2)))
  nfbr(s0, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), cle, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c2))
  nfcv(s0, cle)
  imbi12d(wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wbr(c1, cle, c2), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), wbr(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), cle, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c2)))
  breq12d(c1, cle, c2, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), csb(s0, cv(hs0), c2), wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)))
  breq12d(cfv(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cv(hs0)), cle, cfv(cmpt(s0, c0, c2), cv(hs0)), csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), csb(s0, cv(hs0), c2), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0)))
  syl2anc(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), wceq(cfv(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cv(hs0)), csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)))
  syl2anc(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), wcel(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0))
  chvar(s0, hs0, wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), wcel(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), co(nat0, cicc, cpnf))), wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c1, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf))))
  nfim(s0, wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), wcel(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)))
  nfel1(s0, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), co(nat0, cicc, cpnf))
  imbi12d(wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c1, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), wcel(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)))
  eleq1d(c1, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf), csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)))
  fvmptf(s0, cv(hs0), c0, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), co(nat0, cicc, cpnf), cmpt(s0, c0, c1), c1)
  nfcsb1(s0, cv(hs0), c1)
  csbeq1a(s0, cv(hs0), c1)
  eqid(cmpt(s0, c0, c1))
  syl2anc(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), wceq(cfv(cmpt(s0, c0, c2), cv(hs0)), csb(s0, cv(hs0), c2)), wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c2), co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)))
  syl2anc(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), wcel(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c2), co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0))
  simpl(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0))
  simpr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0))
  chvar(s0, hs0, wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), wcel(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c2), co(nat0, cicc, cpnf))), wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c2, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf))))
  nfim(s0, wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), wcel(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c2), co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)))
  nfan(s0, w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0))
  nfv(s0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0))
  nfel(s0, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c2), co(nat0, cicc, cpnf))
  nfcv(s0, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf))
  imbi12d(wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c2, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), wcel(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c2), co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)))
  anbi2d(wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c0))
  eleq1w(s0, hs0, c0)
  eleq1d(c2, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf), csb(s0, cv(hs0), c2), wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)))
  fvmptf(s0, cv(hs0), c0, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c2), co(nat0, cicc, cpnf), cmpt(s0, c0, c2), c2)
  nfcsb1(s0, cv(hs0), c2)
  nfcv(s0, cv(hs0))
  csbeq1a(s0, cv(hs0), c2)
  eqid(cmpt(s0, c0, c2))
  diff.hs0.c(cmpt(s0, c0, c1))
  diff.hs0.c(cmpt(s0, c0, c2))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.co.s(s0, nat0, cicc, cpnf)
  diff.nat0.s(s0)
  diff.cicc.s(s0)
  diff.cpnf.s(s0)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.cle.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: sge0splitmpt
blocks.content: Split a sum of nonnegative extended reals into two parts. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 17-Aug-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm sge0splitmpt(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cfv(csumge0, cmpt(s0, cun(c0, c1), c2)), co(cfv(csumge0, cmpt(s0, c0, c2)), cxad, cfv(csumge0, cmpt(s0, c1, c2)))))
  -| wnf(s0, w0)
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(cin(c0, c1), emptycls))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c2, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wcel(c2, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
} = {
  eqtrd(cfv(csumge0, cmpt(s0, cun(c0, c1), c2)), co(cfv(csumge0, cmpt(s0, c0, c2)), cxad, cfv(csumge0, cmpt(s0, c1, c2))), co(cfv(csumge0, cres(cmpt(s0, cun(c0, c1), c2), c0)), cxad, cfv(csumge0, cres(cmpt(s0, cun(c0, c1), c2), c1))), w0)
  sge0split(cmpt(s0, cun(c0, c1), c2), c0, c1, c3, c4, cun(c0, c1), w0)
  eqid(cun(c0, c1))
  fmptdf(s0, cmpt(s0, cun(c0, c1), c2), cun(c0, c1), co(nat0, cicc, cpnf), c2, w0)
  pm2.61dan(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cun(c0, c1))), wcel(c2, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), wcel(cv(s0), c0))
  adantlr(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cun(c0, c1)), wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(c2, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)))
  syl2anc(wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cun(c0, c1))), wn(wcel(cv(s0), c0))), wcel(c2, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1))
  simpll(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cun(c0, c1)), wn(wcel(cv(s0), c0)))
  adantll(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cun(c0, c1)), wn(wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(cv(s0), c1))
  elunnel1(cv(s0), c0, c1)
  eqid(cmpt(s0, cun(c0, c1), c2))
  a1i(w0, wceq(co(cfv(csumge0, cres(cmpt(s0, cun(c0, c1), c2), c0)), cxad, cfv(csumge0, cres(cmpt(s0, cun(c0, c1), c2), c1))), co(cfv(csumge0, cmpt(s0, c0, c2)), cxad, cfv(csumge0, cmpt(s0, c1, c2)))))
  oveq12i(cfv(csumge0, cres(cmpt(s0, cun(c0, c1), c2), c0)), cxad, cfv(csumge0, cres(cmpt(s0, cun(c0, c1), c2), c1)), cfv(csumge0, cmpt(s0, c0, c2)), cfv(csumge0, cmpt(s0, c1, c2)))
  fveq2i(csumge0, cres(cmpt(s0, cun(c0, c1), c2), c0), cmpt(s0, c0, c2))
  resmpti(s0, cun(c0, c1), c2, c0)
  ssun1(c0, c1)
  fveq2i(csumge0, cres(cmpt(s0, cun(c0, c1), c2), c1), cmpt(s0, c1, c2))
  resmpti(s0, cun(c0, c1), c2, c1)
  ssun2(c1, c0)
  diff.cun.s(s0, c0, c1)
  diff.co.s(s0, nat0, cicc, cpnf)
  diff.nat0.s(s0)
  diff.cicc.s(s0)
  diff.cpnf.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: sge0ss
blocks.content: Change the index set to a subset in a sum of nonnegative extended reals. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 17-Aug-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm sge0ss(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cfv(csumge0, cmpt(s0, c0, c1)), cfv(csumge0, cmpt(s0, c2, c1))))
  -| wnf(s0, w0)
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wss(c0, c2))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c1, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cdif(c2, c0))), wceq(c1, nat0))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
} = {
  3eqtr4d(cfv(csumge0, cmpt(s0, c0, c1)), cfv(csumge0, cmpt(s0, c2, c1)), co(cfv(csumge0, cmpt(s0, c0, c1)), cxad, cfv(csumge0, cmpt(s0, cdif(c2, c0), c1))), cfv(csumge0, cmpt(s0, cun(c0, cdif(c2, c0)), c1)), w0)
  eqcomd(co(cfv(csumge0, cmpt(s0, c0, c1)), cxad, cfv(csumge0, cmpt(s0, cdif(c2, c0), c1))), cfv(csumge0, cmpt(s0, cun(c0, cdif(c2, c0)), c1)), w0)
  sge0splitmpt(s0, c0, cdif(c2, c0), c1, universe, universe, w0)
  a1i(w0, wceq(cin(c0, cdif(c2, c0)), emptycls))
  disjdif(c0, c2)
  eqeltrd(c1, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf), nat0, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cdif(c2, c0))))
  a1i(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cdif(c2, c0))), wcel(nat0, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)))
  0e0iccpnf()
  3eqtrrd(cfv(csumge0, cmpt(s0, c0, c1)), co(cfv(csumge0, cmpt(s0, c0, c1)), cxad, cfv(csumge0, cmpt(s0, cdif(c2, c0), c1))), co(cfv(csumge0, cmpt(s0, c0, c1)), cxad, nat0), cfv(csumge0, cmpt(s0, c0, c1)), w0)
  oveq2d(cfv(csumge0, cmpt(s0, c0, c1)), cxad, cfv(csumge0, cmpt(s0, cdif(c2, c0), c1)), nat0, w0)
  eqtrd(cfv(csumge0, cmpt(s0, cdif(c2, c0), c1)), nat0, cfv(csumge0, cmpt(s0, cdif(c2, c0), nat0)), w0)
  fveq2d(csumge0, cmpt(s0, cdif(c2, c0), c1), cmpt(s0, cdif(c2, c0), nat0), w0)
  mpteq2da(s0, cdif(c2, c0), c1, nat0, w0)
  sge0z(s0, cdif(c2, c0), universe, w0)
  syl(w0, wcel(cdif(c2, c0), universe), wcel(c2, c3))
  difexg(c2, c3, c0)
  syl(w0, wceq(co(cfv(csumge0, cmpt(s0, c0, c1)), cxad, nat0), cfv(csumge0, cmpt(s0, c0, c1))), wcel(cfv(csumge0, cmpt(s0, c0, c1)), cxr))
  sge0xrcl(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), c0, universe, w0)
  syl2anc(w0, wcel(c0, universe), wss(c0, c2), wcel(c2, c3))
  ssexg(c0, c2, c3)
  fmptdf(s0, cmpt(s0, c0, c1), c0, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf), c1, w0)
  eqid(cmpt(s0, c0, c1))
  xaddid1(cfv(csumge0, cmpt(s0, c0, c1)))
  eqidd(cfv(csumge0, cmpt(s0, c0, c1)), w0)
  fveq2d(csumge0, cmpt(s0, c2, c1), cmpt(s0, cun(c0, cdif(c2, c0)), c1), w0)
  mpteq1d(s0, c2, c1, cun(c0, cdif(c2, c0)), w0)
  eqcomd(c2, cun(c0, cdif(c2, c0)), w0)
  sylib(w0, wceq(cun(c0, cdif(c2, c0)), c2), wss(c0, c2))
  undif(c0, c2)
  diff.co.s(s0, nat0, cicc, cpnf)
  diff.nat0.s(s0)
  diff.cicc.s(s0)
  diff.cpnf.s(s0)
  diff.cun.s(s0, c0, cdif(c2, c0))
  diff.cdif.s(s0, c2, c0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm sge0ss(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(sum^ `(s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1))=(sum^ `(s0 ∈ c2 ↦ c1)))
  ⊣ F/(s0, w0)
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈ c3)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ⊆ c2)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0)→ c1 ∈(0[[,]]+∞))
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈(c2 \ c0))→ c1 = 0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
} = {
  3eqtr4d((sum^ `(s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)), (sum^ `(s0 ∈ c2 ↦ c1)), ((sum^ `(s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1))[+](sum^ `(s0 ∈(c2 \ c0)↦ c1))), (sum^ `(s0 ∈(c0 ⋃(c2 \ c0))↦ c1)), w0)
  eqcomd(((sum^ `(s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1))[+](sum^ `(s0 ∈(c2 \ c0)↦ c1))), (sum^ `(s0 ∈(c0 ⋃(c2 \ c0))↦ c1)), w0)
  sge0splitmpt(s0, c0, (c2 \ c0), c1, universe, universe, w0)
  a1i(w0, (c0 ⋂(c2 \ c0))= ∅)
  disjdif(c0, c2)
  eqeltrd(c1, (0[[,]]+∞), nat0, (w0 ∧ s0 ∈(c2 \ c0)))
  a1i((w0 ∧ s0 ∈(c2 \ c0)), 0 ∈(0[[,]]+∞))
  0e0iccpnf()
  3eqtrrd((sum^ `(s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)), ((sum^ `(s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1))[+](sum^ `(s0 ∈(c2 \ c0)↦ c1))), ((sum^ `(s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1))[+]0), (sum^ `(s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)), w0)
  oveq2d((sum^ `(s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)), cxad, (sum^ `(s0 ∈(c2 \ c0)↦ c1)), nat0, w0)
  eqtrd((sum^ `(s0 ∈(c2 \ c0)↦ c1)), nat0, (sum^ `(s0 ∈(c2 \ c0)↦ 0)), w0)
  fveq2d(csumge0, (s0 ∈(c2 \ c0)↦ c1), (s0 ∈(c2 \ c0)↦ 0), w0)
  mpteq2da(s0, (c2 \ c0), c1, nat0, w0)
  sge0z(s0, (c2 \ c0), universe, w0)
  syl(w0, (c2 \ c0)∈ 𝕌, c2 ∈ c3)
  difexg(c2, c3, c0)
  syl(w0, ((sum^ `(s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1))[+]0)=(sum^ `(s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)), (sum^ `(s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1))∈ ℝ*)
  sge0xrcl((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1), c0, universe, w0)
  syl2anc(w0, c0 ∈ 𝕌, c0 ⊆ c2, c2 ∈ c3)
  ssexg(c0, c2, c3)
  fmptdf(s0, (s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1), c0, (0[[,]]+∞), c1, w0)
  eqid((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1))
  xaddid1((sum^ `(s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)))
  eqidd((sum^ `(s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)), w0)
  fveq2d(csumge0, (s0 ∈ c2 ↦ c1), (s0 ∈(c0 ⋃(c2 \ c0))↦ c1), w0)
  mpteq1d(s0, c2, c1, (c0 ⋃(c2 \ c0)), w0)
  eqcomd(c2, (c0 ⋃(c2 \ c0)), w0)
  sylib(w0, (c0 ⋃(c2 \ c0))= c2, c0 ⊆ c2)
  undif(c0, c2)
  diff.co.s(s0, nat0, cicc, cpnf)
  diff.nat0.s(s0)
  diff.cicc.s(s0)
  diff.cpnf.s(s0)
  diff.cun.s(s0, c0, (c2 \ c0))
  diff.cdif.s(s0, c2, c0)
}

blocks.name: sge0iunmptlemfi
blocks.content: Sum of nonnegative extended reals over a disjoint indexed union (in this lemma, for a finite index set). (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 17-Aug-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm sge0iunmptlemfi(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cfv(csumge0, cmpt(s0, ciun(s1, c0, c1), c2)), cfv(csumge0, cmpt(s1, c0, cfv(csumge0, cmpt(s0, c1, c2))))))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cfn))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s1), c0)), wcel(c1, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wdisj(s1, c0, c1))
  -| wi(w3a(w0, wcel(cv(s1), c0), wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wcel(c2, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s1), c0)), wcel(cfv(csumge0, cmpt(s0, c1, c2)), cr))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)

blocks.name: sge0fodjrnlem
blocks.content: Re-index a nonnegative extended sum using an onto function with disjoint range, when the empty set is assigned ` 0 ` in the sum (this is true, for example, both for measures and outer measures). (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 17-Aug-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm sge0fodjrnlem(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cfv(csumge0, cmpt(s0, c0, c1)), cfv(csumge0, cmpt(s1, c2, c3))))
  -| wnf(s0, w0)
  -| wnf(s1, w0)
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), c4), wceq(c1, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wfo(c6, c2, c0))
  -| wi(w0, wdisj(s1, c2, cfv(c6, cv(s1))))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s1), c2)), wceq(cfv(c6, cv(s1)), c4))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c1, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wceq(cv(s0), emptycls)), wceq(c1, nat0))
  -| wceq(c7, cima(ccnv(c6), csn(emptycls)))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)

  sylibr(w0, wceq(cdif(c2, c7), crab(hs0, c2, wne(cfv(c6, cv(hs0)), emptycls))), wal(s1, wb(wcel(cv(s1), cdif(c2, c7)), wcel(cv(s1), crab(hs0, c2, wne(cfv(c6, cv(hs0)), emptycls))))))

blocks.name: sge0fodjrn
blocks.content: Re-index a nonnegative extended sum using an onto function with disjoint range, when the empty set is assigned ` 0 ` in the sum (this is true, for example, both for measures and outer measures). (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 17-Aug-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm sge0fodjrn(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cfv(csumge0, cmpt(s0, c0, c1)), cfv(csumge0, cmpt(s1, c2, c3))))
  -| wnf(s0, w0)
  -| wnf(s1, w0)
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), c4), wceq(c1, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wfo(c6, c2, c0))
  -| wi(w0, wdisj(s1, c2, cfv(c6, cv(s1))))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s1), c2)), wceq(cfv(c6, cv(s1)), c4))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c1, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wceq(cv(s0), emptycls)), wceq(c1, nat0))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s0, c6)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c6)
} = {
  sge0fodjrnlem(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, c5, c6, cima(ccnv(c6), csn(emptycls)), w0)
  eqid(cima(ccnv(c6), csn(emptycls)))
  diff.cima.s(s0, ccnv(c6), csn(emptycls))
  diff.ccnv.s(s0, c6)
  diff.csn.s(s0, emptycls)
  diff.emptycls.s(s0)
  diff.cima.s(s1, ccnv(c6), csn(emptycls))
  diff.ccnv.s(s1, c6)
  diff.csn.s(s1, emptycls)
  diff.emptycls.s(s1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm sge0fodjrn(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(sum^ `(s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1))=(sum^ `(s1 ∈ c2 ↦ c3)))
  ⊣ F/(s0, w0)
  ⊣ F/(s1, w0)
  ⊣ (s0 = c4 → c1 = c3)
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈ c5)
  ⊣ (w0 →(c6 : c2 ↠ c0))
  ⊣ (w0 → ⊔(s1 ∈ c2,(c6 ` s1)))
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s1 ∈ c2)→(c6 ` s1)= c4)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0)→ c1 ∈(0[[,]]+∞))
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 = ∅)→ c1 = 0)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
  ⊣ d(s0, c4)
  ⊣ d(s0, c6)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c2)
  ⊣ d(s1, c6)
} = {
  sge0fodjrnlem(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, c5, c6, (`' c6 " { ∅ }), w0)
  eqid((`' c6 " { ∅ }))
  diff.cima.s(s0, `' c6, { ∅ })
  diff.ccnv.s(s0, c6)
  diff.csn.s(s0, emptycls)
  diff.emptycls.s(s0)
  diff.cima.s(s1, `' c6, { ∅ })
  diff.ccnv.s(s1, c6)
  diff.csn.s(s1, emptycls)
  diff.emptycls.s(s1)
}

blocks.name: sge0iunmpt
blocks.content: Sum of nonnegative extended reals over a disjoint indexed union. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 17-Aug-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm sge0iunmpt(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cfv(csumge0, cmpt(s0, ciun(s1, c0, c1), c2)), cfv(csumge0, cmpt(s1, c0, cfv(csumge0, cmpt(s0, c1, c2))))))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c3))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s1), c0)), wcel(c1, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wdisj(s1, c0, c1))
  -| wi(w3a(w0, wcel(cv(s1), c0), wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wcel(c2, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c4)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {

blocks.name: sge0iun

thm sge0iun(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cfv(csumge0, c0), cfv(csumge0, cmpt(s0, c1, cfv(csumge0, cres(c0, c2))))))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c3))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wcel(c2, c4))
  -| wceq(c5, ciun(s0, c1, c2))
  -| wi(w0, wf(c0, c5, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)))
  -| wi(w0, wdisj(s0, c1, c2))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  3eqtr4d(cfv(csumge0, c0), cfv(csumge0, cmpt(s0, c1, cfv(csumge0, cres(c0, c2)))), cfv(csumge0, cmpt(hs0, ciun(s0, c1, c2), cfv(c0, cv(hs0)))), cfv(csumge0, cmpt(s0, c1, cfv(csumge0, cmpt(hs0, c2, cfv(c0, cv(hs0)))))), w0)
  sge0iunmpt(hs0, s0, c1, c2, cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), c3, c4, w0)
  ffvelrnd(c0, cv(hs0), co(nat0, cicc, cpnf), c5, w3a(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(hs0), c2)))
  3adant3(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wf(c0, c5, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)))
  sseldd(cv(hs0), c5, c2, w3a(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(hs0), c2)))

  mpteq2dva(s0, c1, cfv(csumge0, cres(c0, c2)), cfv(csumge0, cmpt(hs0, c2, cfv(c0, cv(hs0)))), w0)
  fveq2d(csumge0, cres(c0, c2), cmpt(hs0, c2, cfv(c0, cv(hs0))), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)))

  syl(wa(w0, wbr(cfv(csumge0, cmpt(s0, c0, c1)), clt, cpnf)), wrex(hs1, cn, wbr(co(cfv(csumge0, cmpt(s0, c0, c1)), cdiv, c1), clt, cv(hs1))), wcel(co(cfv(csumge0, cmpt(s0, c0, c1)), cdiv, c1), cr))
  redivcld(cfv(csumge0, cmpt(s0, c0, c1)), c1, wa(w0, wbr(cfv(csumge0, cmpt(s0, c0, c1)), clt, cpnf)))

blocks.name: sge0rernmpt

thm sge0rernmpt(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c1, co(nat0, cico, cpnf)))

  ⊢ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0)→ c1 ∈(0[[,)]+∞))

  iccssxr(nat0, cpnf)
  nltpnft(c1)
  adantr((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0), ¬ c1[<]+∞, c1 ∈ ran((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)))
  syl2anc((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0), c1 ∈ ran((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)), s0 ∈ c0, c1 ∈(0[[,]]+∞))
  simpr(w0, s0 ∈ c0)
  elrnmpt1(s0, c0, c1, (0[[,]]+∞), (s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1))

blocks.name: sge0lefimpt
blocks.content: A sum of nonnegative extended reals is smaller than a given extended real if and only if every finite subsum is smaller than it. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 11-Oct-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm sge0lefimpt(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {

  -| wnf(s0, w0)
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c3))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c1, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cxr))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  bitrd(w0, wbr(cfv(csumge0, cmpt(s0, c0, c1)), cle, c2), wral(s1, cin(cpw(c0), cfn), wbr(cfv(csumge0, cmpt(s0, cv(s1), c1)), cle, c2)), wral(s1, cin(cpw(c0), cfn), wbr(cfv(csumge0, cres(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cv(s1))), cle, c2)))
  sge0lefi(s1, cmpt(s0, c0, c1), c2, c0, c3, w0)
  fmptdf(s0, cmpt(s0, c0, c1), c0, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf), c1, w0)
  eqid(cmpt(s0, c0, c1))
  a1i(w0, wb(wral(s1, cin(cpw(c0), cfn), wbr(cfv(csumge0, cres(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cv(s1))), cle, c2)), wral(s1, cin(cpw(c0), cfn), wbr(cfv(csumge0, cmpt(s0, cv(s1), c1)), cle, c2))))
  ralbiia(s1, cin(cpw(c0), cfn), wbr(cfv(csumge0, cres(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cv(s1))), cle, c2), wbr(cfv(csumge0, cmpt(s0, cv(s1), c1)), cle, c2))
  breq1d(cfv(csumge0, cres(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cv(s1))), cle, c2, cfv(csumge0, cmpt(s0, cv(s1), c1)), wcel(cv(s1), cin(cpw(c0), cfn)))
  fveq2d(csumge0, cres(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cv(s1)), cmpt(s0, cv(s1), c1), wcel(cv(s1), cin(cpw(c0), cfn)))
  resmptd(s0, c0, c1, cv(s1), wcel(cv(s1), cin(cpw(c0), cfn)))
  elpwinss(cv(s1), c0, cfn)
  diff.cmpt.s(s1, s0, c0, c1)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.co.s(s0, nat0, cicc, cpnf)
  diff.nat0.s(s0)
  diff.cicc.s(s0)
  diff.cpnf.s(s0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
}

blocks.name: sge0isum
blocks.content: If a series of nonnegative reals is convergent, then it agrees with the generalized sum of nonnegative extended reals. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 11-Oct-2020.)

blocks.name: sge0xrclmpt
blocks.content: The generalized sum of nonnegative extended reals is an extended real. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 11-Oct-2020.)

blocks.name: sge0xp
blocks.content: Combine two generalized sums of nonnegative extended reals into a single generalized sum over the cartesian product. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 11-Oct-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm sge0xp(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cfv(csumge0, cmpt(s0, c0, cfv(csumge0, cmpt(s1, c1, c2)))), cfv(csumge0, cmpt(s2, cxp(c0, c1), c3))))
  -| wnf(s1, w0)
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s2), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wceq(c3, c2))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c5))
  -| wi(w3a(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wcel(c2, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)

  sge0f1o(s2, s1, cxp(csn(cv(s0)), c1), c3, c1, c2, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c5, cmpt(hs0, c1, cop(cv(s0), cv(hs0))), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)))

  eqidd(cmpt(hs0, c1, cop(cv(s0), cv(hs0))), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s1), c1)))

thm sge0xp(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(sum^ `(s0 ∈ c0 ↦(sum^ `(s1 ∈ c1 ↦ c2))))=(sum^ `(s2 ∈(c0 × c1)↦ c3)))
  ⊣ F/(s1, w0)
  ⊣ (s2 = < s0, s1 > → c3 = c2)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ c4)
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈ c5)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0 ∧ s1 ∈ c1)→ c2 ∈(0[[,]]+∞))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c3)
  ⊣ d(s2, c0)
  ⊣ d(s2, c1)
  ⊣ d(s2, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
  ⊣ d(s2, w0)
} = {
  3eqtr4rd((sum^ `(s0 ∈ c0 ↦(sum^ `(s1 ∈ c1 ↦ c2)))), (sum^ `(s2 ∈(c0 × c1)↦ c3)), (sum^ `(s2 ∈ ⋃(s0 ∈ c0,({ s0 } × c1))↦ c3)), (sum^ `(s0 ∈ c0 ↦(sum^ `(s2 ∈({ s0 } × c1)↦ c3)))), w0)
  sge0iunmpt(s2, s0, c0, ({ s0 } × c1), c3, c4, universe, w0)
  adantr(w0, s0 ∈ c0, ({ s0 } × c1)∈ 𝕌)
  xpexd({ s0 }, c1, universe, c5, w0)
  a1i(w0, { s0 } ∈ 𝕌)
  snex(s0)
  a1i(w0, ⊔(s0 ∈ c0,({ s0 } × c1)))
  disjsnxp(s0, c0, c1)
  3impa(w0, s0 ∈ c0, s2 ∈({ s0 } × c1), c3 ∈(0[[,]]+∞))
  fveq2d(csumge0, (s2 ∈(c0 × c1)↦ c3), (s2 ∈ ⋃(s0 ∈ c0,({ s0 } × c1))↦ c3), w0)
  mpteq1d(s2, (c0 × c1), c3, ⋃(s0 ∈ c0,({ s0 } × c1)), w0)
  a1i(w0, (c0 × c1)= ⋃(s0 ∈ c0,({ s0 } × c1)))
  eqcomi((c0 × c1), ⋃(s0 ∈ c0,({ s0 } × c1)))
  iunxpconst(s0, c0, c1)
  fveq2d(csumge0, (s0 ∈ c0 ↦(sum^ `(s1 ∈ c1 ↦ c2))), (s0 ∈ c0 ↦(sum^ `(s2 ∈({ s0 } × c1)↦ c3))), w0)
  mpteq2da(s0, c0, (sum^ `(s1 ∈ c1 ↦ c2)), (sum^ `(s2 ∈({ s0 } × c1)↦ c3)), w0)
  nfv(s0, w0)
  eqcomd((sum^ `(s1 ∈ c1 ↦ c2)), (sum^ `(s2 ∈({ s0 } × c1)↦ c3)), (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0))
  sge0f1o(s2, s1, ({ s0 } × c1), c3, c1, c2, < s0, s1 >, c5, (hs0 ∈ c1 ↦ < s0, hs0 >), (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0))
  nfv(s2, (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0))
  adantr(w0, s0 ∈ c0, c1 ∈ c5)
  projf1o(hs0, (hs0 ∈ c1 ↦ < s0, hs0 >), c1, s0, c0, (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0))
  simpr(w0, s0 ∈ c0)
  eqid((hs0 ∈ c1 ↦ < s0, hs0 >))
  adantlr(w0, s0 ∈ c0, s1 ∈ c1, ((hs0 ∈ c1 ↦ < s0, hs0 >)` s1)= < s0, s1 >)
  fvmptd(hs0, (hs0 ∈ c1 ↦ < s0, hs0 >), s1, < s0, s1 >, c1, < s0, hs0 >, universe, (w0 ∧ s1 ∈ c1))
  eqidd((hs0 ∈ c1 ↦ < s0, hs0 >), (w0 ∧ s1 ∈ c1))
  adantl((w0 ∧ s1 ∈ c1), hs0 = s1, < s0, hs0 > = < s0, s1 >)
  opeq2(hs0, s1, s0)
  simpr(w0, s1 ∈ c1)
  a1i((w0 ∧ s1 ∈ c1), < s0, s1 > ∈ 𝕌)
  opex(s0, s1)
  mpd(((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0)∧ s2 ∈({ s0 } × c1)), c3 ∈(0[[,]]+∞), ∃(s1 ∈ c1, s2 = < s0, s1 >))
  adantl((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0), s2 ∈({ s0 } × c1), ∃(s1 ∈ c1, s2 = < s0, s1 >))
  biimpi(s2 ∈({ s0 } × c1), ∃(s1 ∈ c1, s2 = < s0, s1 >))
  ax-mp((s2 ∈({ s0 } × c1)↔ ∃(s1 ∈ c1, s2 = < s0, s1 >)), s0 ∈ 𝕌)
  vex(s0)
  elsnxp(s1, s0, universe, s2, c1)
  rexlimd(s1, c1, ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0)∧ s2 ∈({ s0 } × c1)), s2 = < s0, s1 >, c3 ∈(0[[,]]+∞))
  nfan(s1, (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0), s2 ∈({ s0 } × c1))
  nfan(s1, w0, s0 ∈ c0)
  nfv(s1, s0 ∈ c0)
  nfv(s1, s2 ∈({ s0 } × c1))
  nfv(s1, c3 ∈(0[[,]]+∞))
  adantr((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0), s2 ∈({ s0 } × c1), (s1 ∈ c1 →(s2 = < s0, s1 > → c3 ∈(0[[,]]+∞))))
  3exp((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0), s1 ∈ c1, s2 = < s0, s1 >, c3 ∈(0[[,]]+∞))
  eqeltrd(c3, (0[[,]]+∞), c2, ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0)∧ s1 ∈ c1 ∧ s2 = < s0, s1 >))
  3ad2ant3((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0), s1 ∈ c1, s2 = < s0, s1 >, c3 = c2)
  3adant3((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0), s1 ∈ c1, s2 = < s0, s1 >, c2 ∈(0[[,]]+∞))
  3expa(w0, s0 ∈ c0, s1 ∈ c1, c2 ∈(0[[,]]+∞))
  diff.universe.s(s0)
  diff.universe.s(s1)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, s0, c0)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, s2, ({ s0 } × c1))
  diff.cv.s(s1, s2)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, c3, (0[[,]]+∞))
  diff.co.s(s1, nat0, cicc, cpnf)
  diff.nat0.s(s1)
  diff.cicc.s(s1)
  diff.cpnf.s(s1)
  diff.cxp.s(s2, c0, c1)
  diff.ciun.s(s2, s0, c0, ({ s0 } × c1))
  diff.cxp.s(s2, { s0 }, c1)
  diff.csn.s(s2, s0)
  diff.cop.s(s2, s0, s1)
  diff.cv.s(s2, s1)
  diffss.ex(s2, s1)
  diff.cmpt.s(s2, hs0, c1, < s0, hs0 >)
  diff.cop.s(s2, s0, hs0)
  diff.cv.s(s2, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s2, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s2)
  diff.cxp.s(s1, { s0 }, c1)
  diff.csn.s(s1, s0)
  diff.cmpt.s(s1, hs0, c1, < s0, hs0 >)
  diff.cop.s(s1, s0, hs0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.wa.s(s2, w0, s0 ∈ c0)
  diff.wcel.s(s2, s0, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s2, s0)
  diffss.ex(s2, s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(s1)
  diff.hs0.c(< s0, s1 >)
  diff.hs0.w((w0 ∧ s1 ∈ c1))
}

blocks.name: sge0isummpt
blocks.content: If a series of nonnegative reals is convergent, then it agrees with the generalized sum of nonnegative extended reals. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 11-Oct-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm sge0isummpt(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cfv(csumge0, cmpt(s0, c0, c1)), c2))
  -| wnf(s0, w0)
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c1, co(nat0, cico, cpnf)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, cz))
  -| wceq(c0, cfv(cuz, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(cseq(c3, caddc, cmpt(s0, c0, c1)), cli, c2))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
} = {
  sge0isum(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), c2, c3, c0, cseq(c3, caddc, cmpt(s0, c0, c1)), w0)
  fmptdf(s0, cmpt(s0, c0, c1), c0, co(nat0, cico, cpnf), c1, w0)
  eqid(cmpt(s0, c0, c1))
  eqid(cseq(c3, caddc, cmpt(s0, c0, c1)))
  diff.co.s(s0, nat0, cico, cpnf)
  diff.nat0.s(s0)
  diff.cico.s(s0)
  diff.cpnf.s(s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm sge0isummpt(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(sum^ `(s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1))= c2)
  ⊣ F/(s0, w0)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0)→ c1 ∈(0[[,)]+∞))
  ⊣ (w0 → c3 ∈ ℤ)
  ⊣ c0 =(ℤ≥ ` c3)
  ⊣ (w0 → seq(c3(+,(s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)))[~~>]c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
} = {
  sge0isum((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1), c2, c3, c0, seq(c3(+,(s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1))), w0)
  fmptdf(s0, (s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1), c0, (0[[,)]+∞), c1, w0)
  eqid((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1))
  eqid(seq(c3(+,(s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1))))
  diff.co.s(s0, nat0, cico, cpnf)
  diff.nat0.s(s0)
  diff.cico.s(s0)
  diff.cpnf.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: sge0ad2en
blocks.content: The value of the infinite geometric series ` 2 ^ -u 1 + 2 ^ -u 2 + ` ... , multiplied by a constant. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 11-Oct-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm sge0ad2en(setvar s0, class c0, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cfv(csumge0, cmpt(s0, cn, co(c0, cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, cv(s0))))), c0))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, co(nat0, cico, cpnf)))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  sge0isummpt(s0, cn, co(c0, cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, cv(s0))), c0, nat1, w0)
  nfv(s0, w0)
  elicod(co(c0, cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, cv(s0))), nat0, cpnf, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cn)))
  a1i(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cn)), wcel(nat0, cxr))
  a1i(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cn)), wcel(cpnf, cxr))
  rexrd(co(c0, cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, cv(s0))), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cn)))
  divge0d(c0, co(nat2, cexp, cv(s0)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cn)))
  rpexpcld(nat2, cv(s0), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cn)))
  a1i(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cn)), wcel(nat2, crp))
  2rp()
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cn), wbr(nat0, cle, c0))
  syl3anc(w0, wbr(nat0, cle, c0), wcel(nat0, cxr), wcel(cpnf, cxr), wcel(c0, co(nat0, cico, cpnf)))
  a1i(w0, wcel(nat0, cxr))
  0xr()
  a1i(w0, wcel(cpnf, cxr))
  pnfxr()
  icogelb(nat0, cpnf, c0)
  ltpnfd(co(c0, cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, cv(s0))), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cn)))
  redivcld(c0, co(nat2, cexp, cv(s0)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cn)))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cn), wcel(c0, cr))
  reexpcld(nat2, cv(s0), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cn)))
  a1i(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cn)), wcel(nat2, cr))

  seqeq3d(c2, caddc, cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cmpt(hs1, c0, csb(s0, cv(hs1), c1)), w0)

thm sge0isummpt2(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(sum^ `(s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1))= sum(s0 ∈ c0, c1))
  ⊣ F/(s0, w0)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0)→ c1 ∈(0[[,)]+∞))
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈ ℤ)
  ⊣ c0 =(ℤ≥ ` c2)
  ⊣ (w0 → seq(c2(+,(s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)))[~~>]c3)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
} = {
  3eqtr4rd((sum^ `(s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)), sum(s0 ∈ c0, c1), sum(hs0 ∈ c0,[hs0 / s0]c1), c3, w0)
  isumclim(hs0, c0, [hs0 / s0]c1, c3, c2, (hs1 ∈ c0 ↦[hs1 / s0]c1), w0)
  syl2anc((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c0), ((hs1 ∈ c0 ↦[hs1 / s0]c1)` hs0)=[hs0 / s0]c1, hs0 ∈ c0, [hs0 / s0]c1 ∈(0[[,)]+∞))
  simpr(w0, hs0 ∈ c0)
  fvmptf(s0, hs0, c0, [hs0 / s0]c1, (0[[,)]+∞), (hs1 ∈ c0 ↦[hs1 / s0]c1), c1)
  eqcomi((hs1 ∈ c0 ↦[hs1 / s0]c1), (s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1))
  sseldi([hs0 / s0]c1, cc, (0[[,)]+∞), (w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c0))
  sstri((0[[,)]+∞), cc, cr)
  rge0ssre()
  ax-resscn()
  chvar(s0, hs0, ((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c0)→[hs0 / s0]c1 ∈(0[[,)]+∞)), ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0)→ c1 ∈(0[[,)]+∞)))
  nfim(s0, (w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c0), [hs0 / s0]c1 ∈(0[[,)]+∞))
  nfan(s0, w0, hs0 ∈ c0)
  nfv(s0, hs0 ∈ c0)
  nfel1(s0, [hs0 / s0]c1, (0[[,)]+∞))
  imbi12d(s0 = hs0, (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0), c1 ∈(0[[,)]+∞), (w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c0), [hs0 / s0]c1 ∈(0[[,)]+∞))
  anbi2d(s0 = hs0, w0, s0 ∈ c0, hs0 ∈ c0)

  eleq1d(c1, (0[[,)]+∞), [hs0 / s0]c1, s0 = hs0)
  mpbid(w0, seq(c2(+,(hs1 ∈ c0 ↦[hs1 / s0]c1)))[~~>]c3, seq(c2(+,(s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)))[~~>]c3)
  breq1d(seq(c2(+,(s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1))), cli, c3, seq(c2(+,(hs1 ∈ c0 ↦[hs1 / s0]c1))), w0)
  seqeq3d(c2, caddc, (s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1), (hs1 ∈ c0 ↦[hs1 / s0]c1), w0)
  a1i(w0, (s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)=(hs1 ∈ c0 ↦[hs1 / s0]c1))
  cbvmpt(s0, hs1, c0, c1, [hs1 / s0]c1)
  nfcv(hs1, c1)
  nfcsb1v(s0, hs1, c1)
  csbeq1a(s0, hs1, c1)
  a1i(w0, sum(s0 ∈ c0, c1)= sum(hs0 ∈ c0,[hs0 / s0]c1))
  cbvsum(s0, hs0, c0, c1, [hs0 / s0]c1)
  csbeq1a(s0, hs0, c1)

  nfcv(s0, c0)
  nfcv(hs0, c1)
  nfcsb1(s0, hs0, c1)

blocks.name: sge0xadd
blocks.content: The extended addition of two generalized sums of nonnegative extended reals. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 11-Oct-2020.)

blocks.name: sge0fsummptf
blocks.content: The generalized sum of a finite set of nonnegative extended real numbers is equal to the sum of those numbers, when none of them is ` +oo ` (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 21-Nov-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm sge0fsummptf(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cfv(csumge0, cmpt(s0, c0, c1)), csu(s0, c0, c1)))
  -| wnf(s0, w0)
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cfn))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c1, co(nat0, cico, cpnf)))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
} = {
  3eqtrd(cfv(csumge0, cmpt(s0, c0, c1)), csu(s0, c0, c1), csu(hs0, c0, cfv(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cv(hs0))), csu(s0, c0, cfv(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cv(s0))), w0)
  sge0fsum(hs0, cmpt(s0, c0, c1), c0, w0)
  fmptdf(s0, cmpt(s0, c0, c1), c0, co(nat0, cico, cpnf), c1, w0)
  a1i(w0, wceq(csu(hs0, c0, cfv(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cv(hs0))), csu(s0, c0, cfv(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cv(s0)))))
  cbvsum(hs0, s0, c0, cfv(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cv(hs0)), cfv(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cv(s0)))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), cv(s0), cmpt(s0, c0, c1))
  nfcv(s0, c0)
  nfcv(hs0, c0)
  nffv(s0, cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cv(hs0))
  nfmpt1(s0, c0, c1)
  nfcv(s0, cv(hs0))
  nfcv(hs0, cfv(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cv(s0)))
  sumeq2d(s0, c0, cfv(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cv(s0)), c1, w0)
  ralrimi(s0, c0, w0, wceq(cfv(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cv(s0)), c1))
  ex(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cfv(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cv(s0)), c1))
  syl2anc(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wceq(cfv(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cv(s0)), c1), wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(c1, co(nat0, cico, cpnf)))
  simpr(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0))
  fvmpt2(s0, c0, c1, co(nat0, cico, cpnf), cmpt(s0, c0, c1))
  eqid(cmpt(s0, c0, c1))
  diff.hs0.c(cmpt(s0, c0, c1))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.co.s(s0, nat0, cico, cpnf)
  diff.nat0.s(s0)
  diff.cico.s(s0)
  diff.cpnf.s(s0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cv(s0)))
}

blocks.name: sge0snmptf
blocks.content: A sum of a nonnegative extended real is the term. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 21-Nov-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm sge0snmptf(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cfv(csumge0, cmpt(s0, csn(c0), c1)), c2))
  -| wnf(s0, w0)
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(c1, c2))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
} = {
  eqtrd(cfv(csumge0, cmpt(s0, csn(c0), c1)), c2, cfv(cmpt(s0, csn(c0), c1), c0), w0)
  sge0sn(cmpt(s0, csn(c0), c1), c0, c3, w0)
  fmptdf(s0, cmpt(s0, csn(c0), c1), csn(c0), co(nat0, cicc, cpnf), c1, w0)
  eqeltrd(c1, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf), c2, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), csn(c0))))
  adantl(w0, wcel(cv(s0), csn(c0)), wceq(c1, c2))
  syl(wcel(cv(s0), csn(c0)), wceq(c1, c2), wceq(cv(s0), c0))
  elsni(cv(s0), c0)
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(s0), csn(c0)), wcel(c2, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)))
  fvmptd3(s0, cmpt(s0, csn(c0), c1), c0, c2, csn(c0), c1, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf), w0)
  eqid(cmpt(s0, csn(c0), c1))
  syl(w0, wcel(c0, csn(c0)), wcel(c0, c3))
  snidg(c0, c3)
  diff.csn.s(s0, c0)
  diff.co.s(s0, nat0, cicc, cpnf)
  diff.nat0.s(s0)
  diff.cicc.s(s0)
  diff.cpnf.s(s0)
}

thm sge0snmptf(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(sum^ `(s0 ∈ { c0 } ↦ c1))= c2)
  ⊣ F/(s0, w0)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ c3)
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈(0[[,]]+∞))
  ⊣ (s0 = c0 → c1 = c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
} = {
  eqtrd((sum^ `(s0 ∈ { c0 } ↦ c1)), c2, ((s0 ∈ { c0 } ↦ c1)` c0), w0)
  sge0sn((s0 ∈ { c0 } ↦ c1), c0, c3, w0)
  fmptdf(s0, (s0 ∈ { c0 } ↦ c1), { c0 }, (0[[,]]+∞), c1, w0)

  adantl(w0, s0 ∈ { c0 }, c1 = c2)

  elsni(s0, c0)
  adantr(w0, s0 ∈ { c0 }, c2 ∈(0[[,]]+∞))
  fvmptd3(s0, (s0 ∈ { c0 } ↦ c1), c0, c2, { c0 }, c1, (0[[,]]+∞), w0)
  eqid((s0 ∈ { c0 } ↦ c1))
  syl(w0, c0 ∈ { c0 }, c0 ∈ c3)
  snidg(c0, c3)
  diff.csn.s(s0, c0)

  diff.nat0.s(s0)
  diff.cicc.s(s0)
  diff.cpnf.s(s0)
}

thm sge0ge0mpt(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {

  diff.co.s(s0, nat0, cicc, cpnf)
  diff.nat0.s(s0)
  diff.cicc.s(s0)
  diff.cpnf.s(s0)
}

thm sge0pnffigtmpt(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {

blocks.name: sge0splitsn
blocks.content: Separate out a term in a generalized sum of nonnegative extended reals. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 21-Nov-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm sge0splitsn(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cfv(csumge0, cmpt(s0, cun(c0, csn(c1)), c2)), co(cfv(csumge0, cmpt(s0, c0, c2)), cxad, c3)))
  -| wnf(s0, w0)
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wn(wcel(c1, c0)))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c2, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), c1), wceq(c2, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
} = {
  eqtrd(cfv(csumge0, cmpt(s0, cun(c0, csn(c1)), c2)), co(cfv(csumge0, cmpt(s0, c0, c2)), cxad, c3), co(cfv(csumge0, cmpt(s0, c0, c2)), cxad, cfv(csumge0, cmpt(s0, csn(c1), c2))), w0)
  sge0splitmpt(s0, c0, csn(c1), c2, c4, universe, w0)
  elexd(csn(c1), cfn, w0)
  a1i(w0, wcel(csn(c1), cfn))
  snfi(c1)
  sylibr(w0, wceq(cin(c0, csn(c1)), emptycls), wn(wcel(c1, c0)))
  disjsn(c0, c1)
  eqeltrd(c2, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf), c3, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), csn(c1))))
  sylan2(w0, wcel(cv(s0), csn(c1)), wceq(c2, c3), wceq(cv(s0), c1))
  elsni(cv(s0), c1)
  adantl(w0, wceq(cv(s0), c1), wceq(c2, c3))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(s0), csn(c1)), wcel(c3, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)))
  oveq2d(cfv(csumge0, cmpt(s0, c0, c2)), cxad, cfv(csumge0, cmpt(s0, csn(c1), c2)), c3, w0)
  sge0snmptf(s0, c1, c2, c3, c5, w0)
  diff.csn.s(s0, c1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm sge0splitsn(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(sum^ `(s0 ∈(c0 ⋃ { c1 })↦ c2))=((sum^ `(s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c2))[+]c3))
  ⊣ F/(s0, w0)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ c4)
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈ c5)
  ⊣ (w0 → ¬ c1 ∈ c0)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0)→ c2 ∈(0[[,]]+∞))
  ⊣ (s0 = c1 → c2 = c3)
  ⊣ (w0 → c3 ∈(0[[,]]+∞))
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
} = {
  eqtrd((sum^ `(s0 ∈(c0 ⋃ { c1 })↦ c2)), ((sum^ `(s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c2))[+]c3), ((sum^ `(s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c2))[+](sum^ `(s0 ∈ { c1 } ↦ c2))), w0)
  sge0splitmpt(s0, c0, { c1 }, c2, c4, universe, w0)
  elexd({ c1 }, cfn, w0)
  a1i(w0, { c1 } ∈ Fin)
  snfi(c1)
  sylibr(w0, (c0 ⋂ { c1 })= ∅, ¬ c1 ∈ c0)
  disjsn(c0, c1)
  eqeltrd(c2, (0[[,]]+∞), c3, (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ { c1 }))
  sylan2(w0, s0 ∈ { c1 }, c2 = c3, s0 = c1)
  elsni(s0, c1)
  adantl(w0, s0 = c1, c2 = c3)
  adantr(w0, s0 ∈ { c1 }, c3 ∈(0[[,]]+∞))
  oveq2d((sum^ `(s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c2)), cxad, (sum^ `(s0 ∈ { c1 } ↦ c2)), c3, w0)
  sge0snmptf(s0, c1, c2, c3, c5, w0)
  diff.csn.s(s0, c1)
}

blocks.name: sge0uzfsumgt
blocks.content: If a real number is smaller than a generalized sum of nonnegative reals, then it is smaller than some finite subsum. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 21-Nov-2020.)
blocks.origin:

blocks.name: sge0reuz
blocks.content: Value of the generalized sum of nonnegative reals, when the domain is a set of upper integers. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 8-Apr-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm sge0reuz(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cfv(csumge0, cmpt(s0, c0, c1)), csup(crn(cmpt(s1, c0, csu(s0, co(c2, cfz, cv(s1)), c1))), cxr, clt)))
  -| wnf(s0, w0)

  diff.w3a.s(s1, w0, hs0 ∈(P(c0)⋂ Fin), hs1 = sum(s0 ∈ hs0, c1))
  diff.wcel.s(s1, hs0, (P(c0)⋂ Fin))
  diff.wceq.s(s1, hs1, sum(s0 ∈ hs0, c1))
  diff.wbr.s(s1, hs1, cle, hs2)
  diff.cle.s(s1)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs2)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs2)
  diff.hs2.s(s1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
  diff.wss.s(s0, hs0, (c2[...]s1))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.co.s(s0, c2, cfz, s1)
  diff.cfz.s(s0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
  diff.hs2.c(sum(s0 ∈(c2[...]s1), c1))
  diff.hs2.w(hs1[≤]sum(s0 ∈(c2[...]s1), c1))
  diff.wcel.s(s1, hs1, ran((hs0 ∈(P(c0)⋂ Fin)↦ sum(s0 ∈ hs0, c1))))
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s1)
  diff.crn.s(s1, (hs0 ∈(P(c0)⋂ Fin)↦ sum(s0 ∈ hs0, c1)))
  diff.cmpt.s(s1, hs0, (P(c0)⋂ Fin), sum(s0 ∈ hs0, c1))
  diff.cin.s(s1, P(c0), cfn)
  diff.cpw.s(s1, c0)
  diff.cfn.s(s1)
  diff.csu.s(s1, s0, hs0, c1)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.c((c2[...]s1))
  diff.hs0.c(sum(s0 ∈(c2[...]s1), c1))
}

blocks.name: sge0reuzb
blocks.content: Value of the generalized sum of uniformly bounded nonnegative reals, when the domain is a set of upper integers. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 8-Apr-2021.)
blocks.origin:

  mpd(wa(wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s2), cr)), wral(s1, c0, wbr(csu(s0, co(c2, cfz, cv(s1)), c1), cle, cv(s2)))), wcel(cv(hs0), crn(cmpt(s1, c0, csu(s0, co(c2, cfz, cv(s1)), c1))))), wbr(cv(hs0), cle, cv(s2)), wrex(s1, c0, wceq(cv(hs0), csu(s0, co(c2, cfz, cv(s1)), c1))))

  ax-mp(wb(wcel(cv(hs0), crn(cmpt(s1, c0, csu(s0, co(c2, cfz, cv(s1)), c1)))), wrex(s1, c0, wceq(cv(hs0), csu(s0, co(c2, cfz, cv(s1)), c1)))), wcel(cv(hs0), universe))
  vex(hs0)
  elrnmpt(s1, cv(hs0), universe, cmpt(s1, c0, csu(s0, co(c2, cfz, cv(s1)), c1)), c0, csu(s0, co(c2, cfz, cv(s1)), c1))
  eqid(cmpt(s1, c0, csu(s0, co(c2, cfz, cv(s1)), c1)))
  adantr(wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s2), cr)), wral(s1, c0, wbr(csu(s0, co(c2, cfz, cv(s1)), c1), cle, cv(s2)))), wcel(cv(hs0), crn(cmpt(s1, c0, csu(s0, co(c2, cfz, cv(s1)), c1)))), wi(wrex(s1, c0, wceq(cv(hs0), csu(s0, co(c2, cfz, cv(s1)), c1))), wbr(cv(hs0), cle, cv(s2))))
